loans.name: Busingye Twekambe Group

texts.en:
Amos is a 32-year-old married Ugandan father of five children ranging from 12 to four years of age, three of whom attend school. Amos, who describes himself as a social person and hard working, is both a shop keeper and a farmer. He will use his loan portion of 600,000= to add stock to his business and buy millet and corn. 

Amos' dream for the future is to construct a family house. He is grateful to UGAFODE for giving people loans without collateral.

loans.use: To buy millet and corn

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina comenta que este es su tercer préstamo en Kiva, los anteriores le han sido muy provechosos, ya que pudo invertir en ellos para mejorar su negocio, y poco a poco ir creciendo. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora que quiere seguir creciendo es por ello que se esta esforzando mucho.
Pide nuevamente este préstamo para poder comprar insumos varios para su despensa, como ser verduras, carnes, enlatados y demás, y de esa manera seguir con sus ventas. Agradece por esta nueva oportunidad que recibe que le sera de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Cristina tells us that this is her third loan with Kiva. The previous ones have been very beneficial as she was able to use them to improve her business which has been growing little by little. Cristina is very hardworking and wants to continue to expand her business, which is why she is putting in so much effort.

Cristina is applying for another loan to buy various supplies for her store such as vegetables, meat, canned food and other items so that she can continue making sales. She is grateful for this new opportunity which will be of great help to her.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, canned food and other items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy general merchandise for her motorcycle workshop and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es:
María es una mujer muy trabajadora, ella tiene  4 hijos todos son de pequeñas edades que aun no asisten en la escuela ella es una mujer casada con 33 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Sololá junto su esposo. 

María es una mujer que siempre piensa en el futuro de sus hijos, ella actualmente se dedica al  tejido artesanal, este trabajo lo aprendió hace 5 años, ella con este trabajo ayuda a su esposo a sufragar algunos gastos en la familia, porque lo que gana el esposo no es suficiente para sufragar todos los gastos, María con el apoyo que le da a su esposo pudieron comprar materiales de construcción para empezar a construir la primera fase de la casa, pero con el presupuesto que tenían no lograron terminarlo. 

María anhela terminar la casa y es por eso que le ha propuesto a su pareja, buscar un préstamo para terminar la casa que ella tanto ha soñado. Pues María para generar otros ingresos mas, ahora se ha puesto a la tarea de aprender otro trabajo con para sacar adelante a su familia. Ella realiza ahora bordados a manos como a máquina, porque el sueño de María es tener un hogar para sus hijos. 
Ella con la poca ganancia que genera este nuevo trabajo pagara su préstamo.
texts.en:
María is a very hardworking woman. She has 4 children. All are very young and do not go to school yet. She is a married, 33-year-old woman. She lives in a community in Sololá alongside her husband.

María is a woman who always thinks about her children’s future. She currently makes a living in artisanal weaving. She learned this work 5 years ago. Through this job, she helps her husband to defray some family expenses, because what her husband earns is not enough to defray all of the expenses. María, with the support that her husband gives her, was able to buy construction materials to start building the first phase of their house. However, with the budget they had, they could not finish it.

María wants to finish the house. For this reason, she has suggested to her partner that they request a loan to finish the house that she has dreamed of so much. In order to generate more income, María has started the task of learning another type of work to help her family get ahead. She now does hand and machine embroidery, because María’s dream is to have a home for her children.

With the little earnings she will generate through this new job, she will pay back her loan.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase four tires for a microbus, with which he carries people to the department from the community where he lives.

loans.name: San Francisco Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Francisco está en su ciclo número 3 del programa de comité de mujeres integrado por 18 mujeres todos ellas vecinas y amigas hacen todo lo posible para salir adelante con sus familias. Estas señoras mejoraron sus ingresos gracias al trabajo arduo del día a día. 
Una de ellas es la Sra. Zoraida quien se dedica a la venta de comidas varias que ella misma todos los días se levanta a hacer desde muy tempranas horas. Zoraida es una mujer muy trabajadora y buena en lo que hace, y ya se ha hecho de muy buena clientela. 
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de carnes, verduras, condimentos, hortalizas y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con la venta de sus comidas como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
The San Francisco Group is in the third cycle of the Women's Committee Program. There are 18 group members, all of them neighbors and friends who do everything possible to ensure the well-being of their families. These are women who have earned and have increased their income through hard work every single day. 

One member of San Francisco is Señora Zoraida, who runs a business selling different types of food that she prepares herself. Señora Zoraida is a very industrious woman who does her work well, rising very early each morning to start cooking. Her efforts have paid off in a strong base of customers. 

Señora Zoraida is applying for this loan in order to invest in the purchase of meat, condiments, vegetables, greens, and other supplies. This investment will allow Señora Zoraida to continue selling the food she prepares. She is grateful for the opportunity that this loan is providing her so she can continue to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase meat, condiments, vegetables, greens, and other supplies for preparing food to sell.

loans.name: Madres Coraje Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Madres Coraje” conformado por 05 socios responsables con deseos de seguir creciendo en sus negocios. María de 39 años de edad es separada con 03 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes. Así mismo como actividad secundaria se dedica a la guardería. María tiene el deseo de seguir implementando su negocio. Es por que solicitó el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite y azúcar. El grupo “Madres Coraje” agradecen el crédito brindado ya que hace posible su progreso. María es la primera del lado izquierdo viste polo  color anaranjado.
texts.en:
This is the "Madres Coraje" group, made up of five responsible members who desire to continue to grow their businesses.

Maria, 39 years old, is separated and has three dependent children. She earns a living selling groceries, and she also offers day care services as a secondary activity. 

Maria would like to continue implementing her business, this is why she is requesting the loan to buy rice, oil, and sugar.

The "Madres Coraje" group is grateful for this loan, since it makes their progress possible. Maria is first from the left, wearing an orange shirt.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, and sugar.

loans.name: Dúo Modiam Group

texts.es:
Dúo Modiam
Este dúo lo forman las señoras doña María Ester, quien es la líder del grupo, tiene 2 hijos, es madre soltera y desde hace 1 año vende desayunos en el mercado. Y refacciones, nos cuenta que solicita este crédito porque necesita utensilios para la cocina que ya están deteriorados y una olla de presión para cocinar más rápido, con su trabajo ella sostiene su hogar y sus hijos espera que fape le pueda ayudar, ya que por la temporada navideña tiene muchos clientes ya que vienen varios vendedores al pueblo. Entonces quiere incrementar sus ventas y espera que fape le apoye.
texts.en: María Ester is a member of this ladies duo. She is the leader of the group. She has two children. She is a single mother and has been selling breakfast for a year at a local market. She says that she is requesting this loan because she needs utensils for the kitchen as they are worn and a pressure cooker in order to cook more rapidly. She is able to sustain her household and children through her work and she hopes that FAPE can help her as during the holiday season she has many customers who come to the various sellers in town. So she wants to increase her sales and hopes that FAPE can help her.

loans.use: to buy utinsils for cooking

loans.name: Mosoq Allpa Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “MOSOQ ALLPA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana ella es casada y tiene 48 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de accesorios para carros como parabrisas, llantas y faroles, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos,la socia es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora que sale adelante por sus hijos, la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de accesorios para carros. La socia solicita el crédito para parabrisas, faroles y llantas.

La socia que no se vee su cara y es de cabello rojo  no quiso salir en la foto porque es timida.
 
 Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de venta de computadoras, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the "Mosoq Allpa" communal bank. The bank is located in the Cusco district of the Cusco province and Cusco department.

Ana, one of the members, is 48 years old and married. She has four children. She works at her business selling car accessories such as windshields, tires and headlights. Through this business, she wants to help her children get ahead. She is an entrepreneurial and determined woman who keeps moving forward because of her children. 

She has had the business for eight years and it is going very well for her. Ana's dream is to expand her car accessory sales business. She is applying for this loan in order to buy windshields, headlights and tires.

The members whose pictures are pasted to the group photo had to have their pictures taken after the meeting, because they could not attend due to work.

The other members make their living in business like clothing sales, computer sales, convenience stores, and restaurants. They are thankful to those who make up a part of their dreams through this medium, and they all promise to make all of the loan payments in the established term.

loans.use: to buy windshields, headlights, and tires.

loans.name: Marianela Steffy

texts.es:
Marianela es una joven mujer de 19 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos y estudia la carrera de Ingeniería en telecomunicaciones su carrera la estudia en la universidad pública que se caracteriza por ser la más antigua de la ciudad y cuenta con la certificación a nivel internacional para la validez de su título profesional.
Marianela es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro largo, su lengua materna es el Aymará que no utiliza porque habla español en su carrera y estudia el idioma inglés para la comprensión de algunos textos de su carrera. Vive en casa de sus padres, que es propia y está construida de ladrillo, cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y gas. Sus estudios son a nivel licenciatura ella está en condiciones de insertarse competitivamente en el mercado laboral y profesional tanto del área privada, como en la administración pública, capacitada para formular e implementar  instrumentales, técnicas, políticas y estrategias para el desarrollo de la región. “Me gusta la carrera de telecomunicaciones ya que es una carrera para el futuro …” comenta. Su sueño es ejercer su profesión y continuar con los proyectos en los que trabaja. Ella desea pagar la colegiatura y compra de libros, etc., para poder terminar sus estudios. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años de estudios universitarios.
Es por esos motivos que Marianela solicita un préstamo para pagar su colegiatura y compra de libros que le serán útiles para iniciar el nuevo semestre.
texts.en:
Marianela is a 19-year-old young woman, single, without any children, who is studying telecommunications engineering. She studies in the public university which is the oldest in the city and has a international certification for the validity of her professional degree. 

Marianela has tanned skin, is short, has long black hair, her native language is Aymará which she doesn't use since she speaks Spanish in her program and studies English to understand some of the textbooks for her degree. She lives in her parents' house, which is their own and is built of bricks; it has drinking water, electricity and gas. Her studies are at the bachelor's level. She is ready to enter competitively into the labor and professional market in the private sector as well as public administration, trained to formulate and implement instruments, techniques, policies and strategies for the development of the region. Her dream is to work in her profession and continue with the projects she is working on. She wants to pay the school fees, and purchase books, etc. to be able to finish her studies. She is in her first loan cycle with the institution in the 3 years of her university studies. 

For these reasons, Marianela asks for a loan to pay for her school fees and purchase the books that will be used to start the new semester.

loans.use: to pay her school fees and purchase the books that will be used to begin the new semester.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock up for her business.

loans.name: Bibiroziya

texts.en:
Bibiroziya is 60 years old. She lives with her five children in a place that has a wonderful nature. She is a widow. Their main source of income is from their farm. They own a plot of land where they grow maize, carrots and onions. They sell their harvest at the local markets, from which they derive a small monthly income. She has been in this business more than twenty years. She has great experience in this field.

With her loan she will buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for the new sowing season. She hopes that this loan will help her to get a good harvest and to develop her business.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizers for the new sowing season

loans.name: Shirley Maribel

texts.es:
El crédito se entrega en el  valle del Río Portoviejo en el que está ubicada la ciudad de Portoviejo, es rico en producción de hortalizas, legumbres y frutas tropicales (pepinos, tomate, maíz, sandía, melón, etc.)  Su clima es cálido seco.
Aquí vive la señora Shirley, tiene 48 años está casada y de este matrimonio tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad,  estudian  2 en la Universidad; su esposo es militar retirado y viven en casa propia.
Doña Shirley es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos y con estos ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa por catalogo y productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja sola dos días a la semana cinco horas al día, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene un año que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien, lo que más vende son los perfumes y cosméticos ya que son muy buenos.
El Crédito lo solicita para comprar cosméticos en promoción y así obtener más ganancias con las ventas. Le gusta la que los intereses son bajos  y con pocos trámites para acceder a los créditos.
texts.en:
The loan comes from the Río Portoviejo Vally in which is located the City of Portoviejo.  It is rich in producing vegetables and tropical fruits (cucumbers, tomatoes, corn, watermelon, melon, etc.)  The climate is hot and dry.

This is where Shirley lives.  She is 48 years old, is married, and from this marriage has four older children.  Two study at the university.  Her husband is retired from the military, and they live in their own house.

Shirley is a housewife who, in order to obtain her own resources and with these help her husband with the household expenses, makes a living selling clothing through a catalog and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and accessories for women).  She works alone two days a week for five hours every day.  She leaves her products on credit and collects them every week.  She has been doing this job for a year, and it is going very well.  What she sells most of are the perfumes and the cosmetics since they are very good.

The loan that she is requesting is to buy promotional cosmetics; and, therefore, obtain more profits with the sales.  She likes that the interest is low and there are few steps to access credit.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma payed her first loan on time and now is asking for a second loan that she will use to expand the space of her business and accommodate the machine that she acquired. She says that before she used to outsource the clothes manufacturing, but decided that by doing it herself, she will be able to get more profits. She has shown to be a credit worthy person.
texts.en: Irma payed her first loan on time and now is asking for a second loan that she will use to expand the space of her business and accommodate the machine that she acquired. She says that before she ousourced the cloth manufacturing, but decided that by doing it herself, she will be able to get more profits. She has shown to be a credit worthy person.

loans.use: to expand and refurbish her clothing manufacturing working space.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-pay microgrid

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Hello, world! Meet Alice, a 38 year-old, very energetic, hardworking and ambitious small-scale farmer. She hails from Kutus village in the rural town of Kerugoya, a very fertile place that has wonderful weather patterns that support farming. She is happily married and has been blessed with three lovely angels. 

Alice passionately loves farming and has been doing it for the past five years and has never looked back. The animals on her farm have been given names of “wangechi,” which is from a person’s name, and taking care of them makes her very proud. 

Crop farming is close to Alice’s heart but she faces financial challenges buying farm supplies. That is why she is requesting a loan. Through the loan she will be able to buy good-quality seedlings and fertilizer that will boast her crop production. Alice always says, “To be a successful farmer, all you need is good-quality seed, fertilizer and advice from successful farmers.” Improved crop production will immediately result in more profits and hence improved living conditions. When asked how this loan will benefit her, Alice replied, "I will be able to educate my children and feed my family."

loans.use: to buy good-quality seedlings and fertilizer

loans.name: Marine

texts.en:
Marine is a 34-year-old woman from the Zugdidi district. She has a husband and two school-aged sons. The only source of income for this four-member family is Marine's husband's job; he works as a hired worker and generates 300 GEL. The income is really insufficient for the family and they find it hard to tackle their financial difficulties. 

Marine has a great desire to do her part for the family's welfare and to be involved in her own business. She requested a loan but her application was rejected several times because she did not have enough income or business experience. Marine's loan request was approved by the start-up program, a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, which gives people a chance to start or re-start businesses. 

Marine plans to purchase used clothing stock and sell it locally. Marine will sell products from her house and will be able to generate her own income. The loan will greatly assist Marine and her family, enabling them to cover daily costs and improve their living conditions. They await your help.

loans.use: to begin selling used clothes

loans.name: Haleeman

texts.en:
Haleeman  is a 50-year-old, married woman, running a business of milk-selling for many years, with the help of her husband. She has buffaloes for the milking purpose. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She has six children. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. 

Haleeman has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation. Now, she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase one more buffalo to increase milk sales to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions for her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo to increase milk sales.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
El señor  José Antonio de  41 años  de edad,  vive con su esposa no tiene hijos  vive en una casa rentada y se dedica desde hace 05 años al negocio de alquiler de una disco móvil.
Don José Antonio tiene alquila el disco móvil para eventos como fiestas bailables, bodas, cumpleaños, graduaciones, etc. es una persona trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante.
Don José Antonio está solicitando el préstamo para compra de 2 parlantes nuevos  para la disco con el apoyo del préstamo desea mejorar su discomóvil y así poderles dar un buen servicio a sus clientes.
Su sueño es tener su propia casa.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Diciembre del 2014.
texts.en:
José Antonio is 41 years old, lives with his wife, and does not have any children. He lives in a rented house and for the past 5 years he has made a living by renting out a sound system.

José Antonio rents the sound system for events such as dance parties, weddings, birthdays, graduations, etc. He is a hardworking person with dreams of getting ahead.

José Antonio is requesting the loan to buy 2 new speakers for the sound system. With the support of the loan, he wants to improve his sound system and, in this manner, be able to provide good service to his customers.

His dream is to have his own house.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – December 2014

loans.use: to buy speakers for his business.

loans.name: Santos Odilia

texts.es:
Santos, ha utilizado el préstamo anterior para tener materia prima para la elaboración de pupusas, su negocio está mejorando, tiene nuevos clientes y los nuevos ingresos le permiten tener un buen record en el uso de créditos. Su familia se encuentra disfrutando de buena salud, mejor alimentación y vestuario. 
Por motivo de fiestas de fin de año las demandas están creciendo y considera que es importante mantener bien surtido su negocio, por lo que solicita un nuevo financiamiento para comprar harina, quesillo, aceite, tomates, bebidas, etc., para seguir atendiendo bien a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Santos used the prior loan to obtain raw materials to make pupusas [thick corn tortillas stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans]. Her business is improving. She has new customers and the new income allows her to have a good record in her use of loans. Her family is enjoying good health, a better diet, and better wardrobes.

Due to the holidays at the end of the year, demand is increasing and she thinks it is important to maintain her business well stocked. For this reason, she is requesting a new loan to buy flour, cheese, oil, tomatoes, drinks, etc. to continue taking good care of her customers.

loans.use: to buy flour, cheese, oil, tomatoes, drinks, etc. to continue taking good care of her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beer and soft drinks so that he can fill his warehouses.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza se presenta ante ustedes con una sonrisa, un hola y próspero año nuevo, es una micro-empresaria que se dedica a elaborar alimentos para eventos especialmente, inicio su empresa en el año 2000 y prueba del excelente sabor de sus comidas son sus 14 años de bagaje, a sus 48 años de edad tiene una hija y vela por el cuidado suyo y de ella pues es madre Soltera.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de implementos de cocina: ollas, freidora, cubiertos para tener un mejor acabado y presentación de sus platos.
texts.en:
Maritza comes before you with a smile on her face and would like to say hello and happy new year! 

She is a micro entrepreneur who works making food, particularly for special events. She started her business in 2000, and her fourteen years of experience show in the excellent flavor of her food. She is 48 years old and has a daughter. She takes care of herself and her daughter, since she is a single mother.

She is requesting a loan to buy kitchen supplies: pots, a deep fryer, and cutlery to perfect the finish and presentation of her dishes.

loans.use: to buy kitchen supplies like pots, a deep fryer, and cutlery.

loans.name: Bosco

texts.en:
Bosco is 44 years old and a married man with four children between the ages of 2 and 19 years old. All of the children attend school. He has farmed for 9 years and will use the loan from Kiva to buy fertilizers for his maize crop, which he will sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay his workers.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for his maize crop, which he will sell.

loans.name: Mastona

texts.en:
25-year-old Mastona is a young wife and mother of two children. Her children are still small; they are 5 and 1 year old. Mastona raises her children herself, because her husband works abroad to support the family and provide them with good living conditions. Mastona takes care of the children at home. She is also engaged in a business sewing women's clothes. It is convenient for her to sew at home. She learned to sew two years ago and already has good experience.

Currently Mastona plans to buy a new home. She and her husband have saved some money, but to buy a new house they still lack a bit of money. To achieve their goals Mastona requested a loan. You can support this young family now, and they will thank you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase a home

loans.name: Crisbell Elieth

texts.es:
Crisbell es una señora casada, egresada de trabajo social y se desempeña como agente de counicacion social, en una institucion que le ayuda a niños de escasos recursos en la comunidades rurales de nuestro pais.
actualmente esta señora tine la necesidad de terminar de construir su vivienda, ya que el primer  financiamiento lo utilizo para iniciar la construccion  de su vivienda y hoy en dia esta solicitando el segundo prestamos para terminar de construir su vivienda , el cual lo utilizaria en la compra de ventanas , cemento, zinz y pago de mano obra, ya que esto le ayudara habitar en condiciones dignas  a ella y a su familia.
texts.en:
Crisbell is married and has graduated in social work. She works as a social communication agent at an institution that helps children with scarce resources in the rural communities of Nicaragua.

She currently needs to finish building her house. She used the first loan to start building her house.  She is now requesting a second loan to finish building her house. She will use the loan to buy windows, cement, metal sheeting, and to pay for the labor. This will help her and her family to have a decent place to live.

loans.use: to buy windows, cement, metal sheeting, and to pay for the labor.

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo es un campesino de 68 años de edad, que toda la vida ha luchado por conseguir su propio sustento, es un hombre que se le mide a cualquier trabajo y en él nunca encontrara un no pro respuesta.
Desde hace un tiempo ha venido realizando acarreos en el caballo que se puede ver en la foto, pero dicho animal no es suyo y debe pagar una cuota pro usarlo.
Desde hace algún tiempo Gustavo ha venido juntando dinero para comprar el animal y ahora solicita un crédito para completar el dinero, también ara adecuar un coche más liviano para no forzar mucho el animal.
texts.en: Gustavo is a 68-year-old man from the countryside who's worked all his life to support himself. He adapts himself to any job and never takes no for an answer. For some time now, he's been giving horse-drawn carriage rides, as you can see in the picture. However, this animal isn't his, and he has to pay a fee to use it. He's been saving up money for awhile now to buy his own animal, and he is requesting this loan to complete the amount he needs. He also plans to buy a lighter carriage that won't strain the animal as much.

loans.use: buy a new horse and a smaller, lighter carriage

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
La Esperanza es un grupo de la ciudad de San Pedro, tiene 18 integrantes, todas ellas son mujeres muy trabajadoras, que están luchando por salir adelante e ir mejorando el entorno donde viven. Ellas son de una zona rural, que aun está en crecimiento y donde las integrantes luchan por poder crecer y mejorar.
La señora Estelli, es una de las integrantes, trabaja en la venta de productos de limpieza, y luego  recorre por la ciudad y sus alrededores con sus hijos para la venta, es una mujer muy sacrificada, que quiere dar lo mejor a sus hijos, y que no tengan que pasar necesidades como las que ella tuvo que pasar.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para poder seguir haciendo sus productos de limpieza y luchar como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
"La Esperanza" (The Hope) is a group located in San Pedro city. It has 18 members, all of them hard-working women who are struggling to get by and trying to improve the environment they live in. They come from a developing rural area where they strive to grow and improve.

Ms. Estelli, one of the group members, makes a living selling cleaning products throughout the city and its surroundings. She is a sacrificing woman who wants to provide the best for her children so that, unlike herself, they won't have to want for anything.

She requests this loan to buy supplies to keep making her cleaning products and striving as she has been doing for years.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make cleaning products to sell

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
La señora Maura , es de la ciudad de Santaní, es casada, tiene tres hijos, es comerciante dueña de una despensa y mercerias bien surtida con buena ubicación y con clientela bien formada.
Es una persona muy trabajadora, responsable y muy honesta, se esmera cada día para poder salir adelante y de alcanzar sus objetivos, ella empezó con un pequeño negocio vendía hielo, helados y comidas rápidas su sueño de siempre era de tener una despensa bien surtidas. Luego con su esfuerzo y con la ayuda de su marido pudo ampliar su negocio mando construir un salón mas grande para poder armar para su despensa.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos varios para su despensa, como ser verdura, frutas, enlatados, lácteos, panificados y demás, y con ello poder seguir con sus ventas y ayudar a su familia con los ingresos que obtiene.
texts.en:
Maura is from the city of Santaní.  She is married, has three children, and is the owner of a store and a haberdashery (sewing store) that is well stocked with a good location and well-established clientele.  

She is a hardworking, responsible, and very honest person.  She works hard every day to be able to get ahead and to achieve her goals.  She began with a small business selling ice, ice creams, and fast foods.  She dream has always been to have a well stocked store.  Later, with her effort and with the help of her husband, she was able to expand her business by building a bigger room to be able to put together her store.

She is requesting this loan to be able buy to more various products for her store such has vegetables, fruits, canned foods, dairy products, baked goods, and more, and thus be able to continue her sales and to help her family with the income that she gets.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, fruits, canned foods, dairy products, baked goods, and more.

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en:
Innocent is 40 years old. He is married with 2 children ages 6 and 12, and both of them go to school. Innocent is a farmer and has been farming for 15 years. With the loan from Kiva, he would like to buy fertilizers for his maize crop, which he will sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for his children.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for his maize crop, which he will sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cheese and coconuts.

loans.name: Aferdita

texts.en:
This is Aferdita and Foti, her husband; they are married and have one son at the moment due to the fact that the younger one passed away some years back. According to the couple, the sudden loss of their son was extremely devastating. They grieved for a very long time. Even now, there are days when Aferdita bursts in tears thinking of her son. 

Foti has been working as a night man and also receives a little income for his army involvement in the past. Kindly note that those persons who worked previously in some important positions in the army are entitled to get some $150/monthly; it is sort of monthly income. Their son works at the whole buying/selling distribution market for pay.

Aferdita is applying for this loan to make some basic repairs to their washroom.

loans.use: to make basic repairs to their only washroom

loans.name: Dúo Miel Group

texts.es: Quien está integrado por la señora Sandra quien  es propietaria de un local de venta de discos y juegos play station ubicado en el mercado de su localidad anteriormente ella adquirió un crédito en el cual le ha ido muy bien y ha podido hacer su pagos púes ha podido ver las ganancias que este crédito le trajo por lo que agradece a kiva por su ayuda, en esta oportunidad esta solicitando este credito para la compra de juegos y discos para vender.
texts.en:
Dúo Miel [Honey Duo] consists of Sandra and Edgar. Sandra owns a shop that sells albums and Playstation games. Her shop is located in the market of her town. 

She took out a previous loan, which has gone very well for her. She has been able to make her payments, since the loan has generated a profit for her. For this reason, she thanks Kiva lenders for their help. 

This time, she is requesting a loan to buy games and albums to sell in her shop.

loans.use: to buy games and albums to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Virgilio Salvador

texts.es:
Portoviejo es la capital provincial e igualmente es cabecera cantonal del cantón del mismo nombre. Esta urbe es la primera ciudad establecida en la costa ecuatoriana con un clima cálido seco. En la ciudadela los Jazmines de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen el grupo, en casa de una de las socias quienes se reúnen cada quince  días.
El señor Virgilio tiene 64 años, es viudo, comerciante de aves de corral, tiene 4 hijos mayores de edad, vive en su casa de uno de sus hijos.
Don Virgilio se dedica a la comercialización de pollos los cuales los vende recorriendo diferentes lugares a comerciantes que visita y al público en general. 
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en la compra de pollos y alimento para pollos. Sus sueños son tener una empresa que surta de estos productos a toda la provincia. El tiene año haciendo los créditos y le gusta la facilidad que tiene al pagar el crédito y también la responsabilidad que tiene el grupo en hacer los pagos.
texts.en:
Portoviejo is the capital of the province and also the capital of the canton by the same name. This major city was the first city to be established on the Ecuadorian coast and has a hot and dry climate. 

Every fortnight, in the citadel of los Jazmines in Portoviejo, the group meets in the house of one of the group members.

Virgilio is 64 years old, widowed and sells poultry. He has four adult children and lives in the house of one of his children. He sells chickens by visiting traders in different areas of the city and also sells to the general public. 

This new loan will go towards purchasing chickens and feed for the chickens. Virgilio's dream is to have a company that supplies chickens to the entire province. He has been taking out loans for one year and he likes the ease with which he can pay off the loan as well as the responsibility of the group in making repayments.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed for the chickens

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is a married woman with four children, all of whom attend school. Rebecca owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. Rebecca operates a charcoal selling business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces stiff competition from other firewood operators in her business. With the 35,000 KES, she wants to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu (Kiva partner) to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: A Jorge siempre le han llamado la atención las plantas debido a la zona donde vive que es prácticamente agrícola, es por esta razón que estudia Ingeniería Agropecuaria. Estudia el tercer año de la carrera.  Esta soltero y tiene 24 años de edad, sus padres lo han apoyado en todo el transcurso de sus estudios. Solicita el crédito para la compra de herramientas que utiliza en sus prácticas universitarias. Este crédito le será de mucha ya que el podrá realizar sus trabajos de la mejor manera. Su meta próxima es terminar su carrera que tanto ha anhelado. Dentro de los planes futuros de Jorge esta realizar una maestría acorde a la carrera que está estudiando.
texts.en: Jorge has always been interested in plants, as he lives in an almost completely agricultural area, and it is for this reason he is studying Agricultural Engineering. He is attending the third year of this career and he goes to school. He is 24, he is single and his parents have supported him all through his course of studies. He is requesting a loan to buy tools he uses for his university practice. This loan would help him a lot, as he would be able to complete his assignments in the best way possible. His next goal is to complete his studies, something he is really looking forward to. For the future, Jorge plans to get a Master’s Degree in the course of studies he is currently attending.

loans.use: To buy tools he needs for his university practice.

loans.name: Shagufta

texts.en:
Shagufta. a hardworking 41-year-old married mother of four, helps her family by providing tailoring services in her community. With many years of experience, Shagufta knows very well the techniques of stitching. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community, and she earns enough to lead a decent life. 

To help her continue operations of her business, Shagufta has requested a loan of 45000 PKR  to buy stitching material such as spools of threads in various colors and packs of zippers, buttons, etc. to sew more dresses on time. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of her revenues to meet personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stitching material such as spools of threads in various colors and packs of zippers, buttons. etc

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Posa junto a su pareja la cual se encuentra esperando un niño y así añadir un nuevo miembro a la familia que la completan un niño de 7 años de edad.
Hablando un poco Juan es un trabajador del campo, de esos que se le mide y hace cualquier trabajo, en el momento de encuentra construyendo un Kiosco en el cual montara una tienda de venta de abarrotes, granos, refrescos, productos de la canasta familiar en general.
Este hombre quiere iniciar este negocio como una necesidad latente, para mantener a su familia pues sus trabajos como mayordomo no le dejan el suficiente capital, por eso pide ayuda para iniciar su propio negocio,
texts.en:
Juan poses together with his wife who is expecting a child and thus is adding a new member to the family, and completing the family is a 7 year old child. 

Speaking about Juan a little, he is a farmworker, as it is regular and he does any work in general. 

Right now he is building a kiosk which will be a store selling groceries, grains, soft drinks, and staples in general.

This man wants to start this business as a latent need to support his family because his work as a foreman does not leave him with sufficient capital. This is why he is asking for help to begin his own business.

loans.use: To start a general grocery store that he is building

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia has two adult sons who are already independent. Virginia lives alone because she is a widow - her husband died one year ago. 

Although her sons love her very much they can't help her with her expenses all the time, so Virginia is selling bedsheets and other related accessories. She has been in this business for one year. 

She needs a loan to increase the number of bedsheets she is selling because she needs and wants to make more money. She is healthy and she hopes you can help her

loans.use: to increase the number of bedsheets she is selling.

loans.name: Povi

texts.fr: Revendeuse de céréales, de charbons de bois et autres depuis 2010 madame Povi sollicite un second crédit pour acheter plus de marchandises. Elle a pour mari un tailleur avec 05 enfants en charge. Elle souhaite à l'avenir créer d'autres activités génératrices de revenus et assurer le bien - être de la famille. Madame povi est âgée de 49ans et trois de ses enfants sont scolarisés.
texts.en:
Mrs. Povi has retailed cereals, charcoal, and miscellaneous other items since 2010. She is requesting a second loan to purchase more merchandise.

She is married to a tailor. They provide for five children.

In the future, she would like to develop new business and to ensure the well-being of her family. Mrs. Povi is 49 years old and three of her children go to school.

loans.use: to buy cereals and charcoal.

loans.name: Kihondo Women Group

texts.en: Patrick is a member of Kihondo Women Group where members support each other. He is a married man with three children living in Fort Portal Uganda. His business is motorcycle riding and at the same time, selling fresh foods like green pepper, tomatoes, and carrots that bring him more income. He faces a challenge of limited capital. However, he has hopes of expanding his business to new areas. Patrick needs a loan to buy tires for his motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy tires for his motorcycle

loans.name: Mugusu Twimuke Tukole Group

texts.en: Joseph, a member of Mugusu Twimuke Tukole, where members support each other, is 46 years old with eight children. He lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. He makes bricks and at the same time sells fresh foods. He faces the challenge of the rainy season, which affects brick laying. However, he has hopes of constructing a good house for his family. Joseph needs a loan to pay for labor for laying bricks

loans.use: to pay for labor for laying bricks

loans.name: Tweimukye Nkenda Group

texts.en: Joseph is a hardworking, married man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He has been selling alcohol and farming as his income sources since 2003. He is challenged by price fluctuations and high license fees, which have hindered his dream of earning more profits as a result of business growth. Joseph intends to use the loan to buy local brew (waragi) to sell. He is a member of Tweimukye Nkenda where each member guarantees the other to get a loan, since they don’t pledge securities.

loans.use: to buy local brew (waragi) to sell.

loans.name: Kikona Tukurakurane Farmers Group

texts.en: Russia is a hardworking, Ugandan, married woman. She is 36 years old with three children. She lives in Kagadi where she has been selling food stuff in the market and farming since 2008 for financial support. She hopes to grow her business despite insufficient capital, her major challenge. Russia is asking for credit to buy more tomatoes for selling. She is a member of Kikona Tukurakurane Farmers where each member guarantees the other to get a loan.

loans.use: to buy more tomatoes for selling

loans.name: Kitojo Tukole Group

texts.en: Margret is a member of Kitojo Tukole Group, where each member supports the other. She is 43 years old with 4 children and lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. She sells fresh foods and at the same time, does farming. She faces challenges of price fluctuation and perishability of her products. However, she has hopes of building a permanent house. Margret needs a loan to buy fresh foods for sell.

loans.use: to buy fresh foods for sale

loans.name: Fabio

texts.es:
Fabio es un carismático, sonriente, humilde, honorable hombre de 64 años de edad que inicio su negocio de tienda general por necesidad económica y por era un trabajo que no necesitaba mucho esfuerzo físico, es padre de tres hijos ya mayores de edad pero con su tienda puede generar los ingresos para el sustento diario de él y su señora. 
Fabio solicita un crédito para abastecerse de refrescos y cerveza.
texts.en:
Fabio is a charismatic, smiling, humble, and honorable man of 64 years of age. He started a general store out of economic necessity and because it was a job that didn't require much physical effort. He is the father of three grown children, and with the income from his store he is able to sustain his wife and himself.

Fabio is requesting this loan so that he can stock his store with soft drinks and beer.

loans.use: stock up on soft drinks and beer

loans.name: Dora Miriam

texts.es:
Dora, de 45 años de edad, está acompañada y es madre de 6 hijos, de los cuales 3 estan casados y viven aparte, los otros tres viven con ella. 

Dora, se dedica a cuidar a sus hijos, ya que su esposo está en los Estados Unidos y les ayuda económicamente para mantener a su familia.- e

En temporada de cortar café, sus hijos trabajan en ello y ayudan con los gastos del hogar.

El crédito lo invertirá para reparar el techo de su vivienda, ya que el invierno lo daño bastante.

El sueño de Dora, es poder mejorar su casa y poder dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida .
texts.en:
Dora is 45 years old, in a relationship, and the mother of six children. Three of her children are married and live separately. The other three live with her.

Dora is taking care of the children while her husband is in the United States trying to support their family financially. During the coffee picking season, her children work so that they can help with the household expenses.

This loan will be used to repair the roof of her home since it sustained damage during the winter. Dora’s dream is to improve her house so that she can provide a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to repair the roof of her home.

loans.name: Eustar's Group

texts.en:
Eustar is the group leader of her group in Kakamega South District, and she is representing 12 farmers, including herself. She is married and a proud mother of 3 children. Eustar joined One Acre Fund for the first time this season, but she has been a farmer for 10 years.

Like many other farmers, Eustar decided to work with One Acre Fund in order to have access to quality training and to acquire new farming methods. She hopes that by joining One Acre Fund and using the seeds and fertilizer she will get with this loan, she can join the ranks of One Acre Fund farmers who have doubled their harvest in their first year of the program. 

Eustar's Group will use the farming inputs received with this loan to cultivate a total of 6.25 acres of land. They will also receive a total of 3 solar lights. Though Eustar decided not to, some of the farmers in the group will also be purchasing a solar light as part of their loan package.

loans.use: to gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seedlings for his farm.

loans.name: Bundikawungu 1V Tusisimuke Women's Group

texts.en:
Wilson, whose hand is raised in this group, is a forty-six-year-old man, married with seven children and living in Bundibugyo-uganda. 

He is a hardworking man who loves his business of cocoa trading. He also has a cocoa garden to supplement his business. 

He hopes to expand his business, though he is affected by unreliable weather. He wants a loan to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.use: to buy cocoa to sell.

loans.name: Ebennencer Group

texts.es:
Una comunidad del estado de Oaxaca es reconocida por su producción de caña; la mayoría de los caminos están rodeados de cerros y una gran vegetación, en especial las plantaciones de este fruto. En el lugar se consolidó un grupo llamado Ebennecer, nombre de origen hebreo que significa piedra de ayuda; para los integrantes, VisionFund es quien les brinda la ayuda para continuar con su actividad al otorgarles un préstamo. Los negocios de cada uno de ellos son:

Claudia –Venta De Cosméticos 
Celia - Venta De Complementos Alimenticios
Eluteria  - Cria De Cerdos
Cidronia - Servicio De Chofer De Carga
Ernestina - Venta De Ropa

Doña Eluteria es una gran mujer, tiene 76 años de edad, su lengua materna es el mazateco aunque también habla español; no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar y desde hace 20 años que perdió a su marido, ha sido padre y madre para sus hijos quienes en la actualidad la apoyan económicamente. Con ella viven un nieto de 23 años y una bisnieta de 10 años quien aún va a la escuela. A doña Eluteria le gusta criar animales tiene cerca de 25 gallinas, 3 gallos, 1 cotorro y algunos puercos que hace tres años decidió comenzar a criar para vender. Con las ganancias obtenidas y los préstamos que ha recibido con anterioridad compra nuevamente cochinitos que vende ya hasta que pesan aproximadamente 80 o 90 kilos, también compra alimento, cubre sus gastos personales y lleva un pequeño ahorro pues dos veces al año visita a sus hijos que viven en otras ciudades.

Por el momento, Eluteria tiene tres marranos los cuales ya están en trato de venta por ello ha solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar tres animales más de 1 mes de nacidos y criarlos, “Con los ahorros que tengo y las ganancias que obtendré de la venta de mis tres marranos compraré una marrana para cría, lo bueno es que el terreno es amplio” de esta manera las ganancias serán un poco mayores. Eluteria comenta que su nieto le ayuda a lavar el chiquero pues deben jalar agua del pozo.

El grupo agradece la nueva oportunidad que no desaprovecharán trabajando en sus actividades y pagando en tiempo sus cuotas.

*En la imagen: Doña Eluteria lleva un mandil el cual, menciona, se quita únicamente para dormir.
texts.en:
A community in the state of Oaxaca is known for its production of sugar cane. The majority of the roads are surrounded by hills and a lot of vegetation, especially sugar cane plantations. A group called Ebennecer was formed here; the name, of Hebrew origin, means "helping stone."

VisionFund helps the members continue with their jobs by granting them loans. The members and their businesses are Claudia, cosmetics sales; Celia, nutritional supplements sales; Eluteria, pig sales; Cidronia, cargo transportation driver; and Ernestina, clothing sales.

Eluteria, 76, is a great woman. Her native language is Mazatec and she also speaks Spanish.  She wasn't able to go to school and, since she lost her husband 20 years ago, she has been father and mother to her children, who currently help her financially. She lives with a grandson, 23, and a great-granddaughter, 10, who still attends school.

Eluteria likes to raise animals. She has about 25 hens, 3 roosters, a parrot, and some pigs, which she decided to start raising for sale three years ago. With her earnings and her previous loans, she buys little pigs, which she sells when they weigh about 80 or 90 kilos. She also buys feed. She covers her personal expenses and has some savings, because twice a year she visits her children who live in other cities.

At the moment Eluteria has three pigs. They're already under contract for sale, so she has requested another loan to buy three pigs older than a month old to raise. "With the earnings from the sale of my three pigs I'm going to buy a female pig to raise. The good thing is that the plot of land is big". That way her profits will be a little higher. Eluteria said her grandson helps her wash the pigsty because they have to draw water from the well.

The group is grateful for the new opportunity they're going to take advantage of in their jobs and making their payments.

*In the photo Eluteria's wearing an apron, which she says she takes off only to sleep.

loans.use: to buy three one-month-old pigs

location.town: Localidad El Zapote, Municipio Acatlan Oaxaca

loans.name: Maranura Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MARANURA, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Maranura, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Frida tiene 49 años de edad tiene 05 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia, la socia vende arroz,azúcar,leche ,gaseosas entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de leche, azúcar entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los demás socios se dedican a la agricultura, crianza de animales, venta de cereales.
texts.en:
This is the Maranura communal bank, located in the Maranura district, La Convención province, Cusco department.

Frida, age 49, is married and has five children. She alternates her daily activities with working in her grocery store business. She has been in her business for a good amount of time. It is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into her business every day.

She wishes to be able to continue working in order to continue supporting her family in this way. She sells rice, sugar, milk, and soft drinks, among others to all of her customers requesting these items. This is the way that she gets her family ahead.

She is requesting the loan to buy milk and sugar, among other things. She is grateful for the loan that was provided, and she pledges to make her payments.

The other members devote themselves to agriculture, selling animals, and selling grains.

loans.use: to buy milk and sugar, among other things.

loans.name: Maria Apaulia

texts.es:
Maria Apaulia es un viuda de 67 años de edad, que vive y vela por su propio cuidado pues no tuvo descendencia, se dedica a la confección directa en un taller que ella misma adecuo en su cuarto.
Aprendió de la confección gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre, y trabaja diariamente entre 8 y 10 horas,
Maria solicita un crédito para la compra de una maquina semi-industrial y materiales para la confección.
Si apoyas a las muejres de tercera edad, que viven solas apóyala a ella.
texts.en:
Maria Apaulia is a 67-year-old widow who lives on her own and takes care of herself because she has no children. She works as a seamstress and has a workshop that is set up in one of her rooms.

Maria Apaulia learned how to sew thanks to the lessons she received from her mother. She works between 8 and 10 hours a day. Maria is requesting a loan in order to buy a semi-industrial sewing machine and materials for sewing.

If you support older women who live alone, then please support her.

loans.use: to buy a semi-industrial sewing machine and materials for sewing.

loans.name: Ibrahim's Group

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 50-year-old proud father of 7 children. He is a group leader, often described as a very trustworthy person, and is representing his group of 5 farmers in Kakamega South District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Ibrahim has noticed that he has had a healthier life due to better nutrition.

Ibrahim described his harvest as very good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. 

He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. 

With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to invest in a business. With this loan, Ibrahim’s Group will be able to plant a total of 3 acres of land and purchase a total of 2 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Rose's Group

texts.en:
Rose's Group is formed by 8 farmers in Teso District and is being represented by Rose, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 25 years old and is married with one child. Rose has been a farmer for 3 years and is often referred to as a very trustworthy person.

Rose isn’t new to One Acre Fund, as she actually joined the program in 2013. She has noticed that her life has changed, especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family ever since. 

This year, Rose will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition because now she will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Rose's Group will purchase a total of 7 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 4 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve their harvests of maize.

loans.name: John Fredy

texts.es:
John es un mecánico soltero de 35 años de edad, sonriente, extrovertido, buen trabajador, respetuoso y honrada, es padre de una pequeña de 4 años de edad y se dedica a la reparación de motocicletas.
Conforme va creciendo como empresa se van presentando necesidades muy puntales, entre ellas esta tener una mesa hidráulica, ya en reiteradas ocasiones ha necesitado de este elemento de trabajo y es por ello que solicita un crédito para la compra de una, pues no tiene el capital para comprarla de una.
Con tu apoyo John podrá tener este importante elemento de trabajo que ayudara a seguir con el progreso de su empresa, mejorando no solo su calidad de vida, si no la de su hija que vive con su madre.
texts.en:
John is a 35 year-old single mechanic. He is extrovert, hardworking and respectful, and the father of a 4 year-old girl. He repairs motorcycles for a living.

As his business is growing, he needs to acquire some material in order to keep up with the increasing demand. More particularly, he needs to buy a lift paltform, and this is why he requested a loan. 

With your support, John will be able to buy this important work item, and continue growing his business. This will enable him to improve his standard of living, and also his daughter's, who lives with her mother.

loans.use: to buy a lift platform for the repair of motorcycles.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en: Razia is 57 years old and a married woman. She runs a business of milk selling with her husband, who is also shown in the photo. She has buffaloes and cows for milk production. Her husband sells the milk in nearby areas.  Razia’s job is to look after the buffaloes and collect the milk from them. Razia and her husband are supporting their family; however, they need to earn more income for their everyday expenditures. Therefore, Razia has requested a 45,000 PKR loan to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers, which will provide a better standard of living for her family.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers.

loans.name: Lesbi Catarina

texts.es:
Lesbi es una señorita muy entusiasta y amable que trabaja muy duro todos los días para ganarse la vida. Ella tiene 25 años de edad, y es soltera. 

Ella se dedica con mucha fé, alegría y optimismo a la crianza de animales domésticos (cerdos, gallinas, etc.) la crianza de estos animales lo realiza en su casa de habitación. Se dedica esta actividad porque de niña le llamó la atención criar animales, es por ello ahora se dedica a lo que le gusta hacer y además de ello genera sus ingresos para cubrir sus necesidades básicas. Ella se ha dado cuenta que esta actividad es muy rentable y tiene mucha demanda porque en su comunidad la gente consume la carne de estos animales.

Ella cuenta que solicitará un préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción para remodelar su casa; este préstamo lo pagará con las ganancias que le genera la compraventa de animales.
 
Uno de sus principales sueños es que en un futuro sus ganancias incrementen y con ello crear mejores condiciones para la crianza de sus animales; por otro lado desea seguir estudiando
texts.en:
Lesbi is a very enthusiastic and kind woman who works very hard every day to earn her living. She is 25 years old and is single. She puts a great deal of faith, happiness and optimism into the rearing of domesticated animals (pigs, chickens, etc.). She raises these animals in her home. Lesbi does this work because it has appealed to her to raise animals ever since she was a little girl. So now she works in what she likes doing, and she also generates enough income from this work to cover her basic needs. 

She has realized that this business is very profitable and that there is great demand, because in her community people eat the meat of these animals. Lesbi says that she will request a loan to purchase construction materials to remodel her house. She will pay off this loan through the earnings generated through the purchase-and-sale of the animals. 

One of Lesbi's greatest dreams is that, in the future, her earnings grow and that through them she is able to improve the living conditions for her animals. She also hopes to continue her studies.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Concepción

texts.es:
Concepción es una señora muy optimista y entusiasta; trabaja muy duro todos los días para darle lo necesario a su familia que se compone de 2 hijos y su esposo. Ella tiene 28 años de edad, está casada. 

Ella se dedica con mucha alegría y una clara visión del futuro a la compraventa de ropa típica (nueva y usada) utilizada en su comunidad. Ella vende su producto en la casa donde vive y también sale a otras comunidades cercanas. Le encanta realizar esta actividad porque por medio de ella se interrelaciona con la gente de su comunidad y conoce a muchas personas; además de ello le genera los ingresos económicos necesarios para cubrir las necesidades básicas de su familia. Tiene dos años de experiencia en esta actividad porque ella empezó a ejercerla desde muy joven aprendiendo de algunas amigas y de su familia.

Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción para la remodelación de su cocina; el préstamo lo pagará con los ingresos que le genere la venta de ropa típica.
 
Concepción tiene dos sueños: uno es mejorar e incrementar su negocio y el otro es terminar de construir su vivienda y así tener una casa digna para ella y su familia.
texts.en:
Concepción is a very optimistic and enthusiastic woman who works very hard every day to provide for her family's needs.  Her family includes her 2 children and her husband.  She is 28 years old, and is married.

Concepción works with great joy and a clear vision for the future in her business selling traditional (new and used) clothing in her community.  She sells her products in her home, and she also goes out to sell in nearby communities.  She loves this kind of work, because it enables her to interact with the people in her community and get to know many people.  Also, the business generates the income she needs to cover the basic necessities for her family.  She has 2 years of experience with this business, because she started working in the business from the time she was very young, learning from some friends and from her family.  

Concepción is requesting a loan to buy construction materials to remodel her kitchen.  She will pay off the loan with the money she earns from her sales of traditional clothing.  

Concepción has two dreams: one is to expand her business, and the other is to finish building her house so her family can live in a decent place.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Kirasa Tweimukye Group

texts.en:
Leonard is a 28-year-old married and hardworking man living in Kagadi-Uganda. He has operated an Agro Input shop since 2010 and also farming to earn an income. 

He hopes to improve his family’s living conditions and standards despite competition leading to low returns on his sales. 

Leonard is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides to sell. He is a member of the Kirasa Tweimukye Group, where each member guarantees the other to get a loan since they don’t pledge securities.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides to sell.

loans.name: Tweimukye Buhungiro Group

texts.en:
Edson is a Ugandan married and hardworking man of 38 years with 4 children. He lives in Kagadi where he has been selling alcohol, and he is also a farmer as a second income source. 

He hopes to grow his business despite challenges of price fluctuations leading to low profit returns. Edson is requesting a loan to buy local brew to sell. 

He is a member of the Tweimukye Buhingire Group where each member guarantees the other to get a loan since they don’t offer securities.

loans.use: to buy local brew to sell.

loans.name: Juan Sebastian

texts.es:
Juan es un Joven de 18 años que se dedica a atender su negoció de Ebanistería el cual fue heredado por su familia y lo emplea no solo para pagar los gastos familiares si no que con este aspira a generar los ingresos suficientes para tatuarse y estudiar. 
Es joven responsable que solicita su ayuda para comprar insumos en madera, calvos, aerosol, puntillas, herramienta que usa a diario.
texts.en:
Juan is a young man of 18 years who runs a cabinetmaking business that he inherited from his family. He's not only able to pay his family expenses with what he earns from the business, but he also hopes to earn enough to go to school and get a tattoo. 

This responsible young man is requesting your help so that he can buy wood, nails, tacks, and other tools that he uses every day.

loans.use: buy wood, nails, and other tools he needs

loans.name: G.s. Piedras De Plata Group

texts.es: Jose Florentino, tiene 37 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa con quien tiene 9 hijos, y reside en una aldea del municipio de Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara.  Siempre se ha dedicado al cultivo de maíz y frijol. Lleva aproximadamente 12 años que también cultiva café en su propio terreno. Esta producción la vende en el mercado de la zona.  Con el fin de darle mantenimiento al cultivo de café ha solicitado otro prestamo a la institución por 5,000 lempiras para poder comprar fertilizantes y aplicarle al cultivo y lograr aumentar la producción. Este prestamo es en forma grupal, el cual se llama Piedras de Plata. Este grupo lo integran cinco personas que viven en la misma zona y se dedican a la agricultura de granos básicos y café como su mayor fuente de ingresos. Solicitan un prestamo total por 16,000 Lempiras para comprar fertilizantes. En la foto se identifican así: a la izquierda está Juan, sigue Jose Santos, Jose Florentino, Mario y Pedro a la derecha.
texts.en: Jose Florentino is 37 years old. He lives in a free union with his wife, with whom he has nine children, and he lives in a village in the municipality of Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. He has always made a living by growing maize and beans. He has also been growing coffee on his own plot of land for approximately 12 years. He sells his produce at the market in the area. With the goal of maintaining his coffee crops, he has requested another loan from the institution in the amount of 5,000 HNL so he can buy fertilisers and apply them to the crops in order to increase his yield. This loan is a group loan; the group’s name is “Piedras de Plata”. This group has five members who live in the same area and whose greatest source of income is from growing staple grains and coffee. They are requesting a loan totalling 16,000 HNL in order to buy fertilisers. In the photo they appear as follows from left to right: Juan, Jose Santos, Jose Florentino, Mario, and Pedro.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers and apply them to his coffee crops

loans.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es:
José, de 22 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, es soltero y vive solo con su madre.

José, trabaja como cobrador de buses desde hace cinco años, sus amigos se dedican al mismo trabajo y fue así como el se fue involucrando en este trabajo, su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 6 p.m.

José, necesita el crédito para reparar su vivienda y para comprar una moto y así desplazarse mas fácil a su trabajo.

José, sueña con ampliar su vivienda, y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su madre.
texts.en:
Jose is 22 years old, single, and he lives alone with his mother. He studied through high school.

He's been working as bus conductor for five years. His friends do the same work and that's how he got involved. His work hours are from 6 am to 6 pm.

Jose needs the loan to repair his home and to buy a motorcycle so that it will be easier to get to work. He dreams of making his home larger and giving a better quality of life to his mother.

loans.use: to repair his home and buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Zoila Angelica

texts.es:
Zoila, se dedica a cultivar granos básicos y a la crianza de ganado, vive con su familia compuesta por sus 4 hijos, no tiene ayuda  económica del extranjero, sus actividades económicas las desarrolla todos los días sin un horario establecido, toda su vida se ha dedicado a trabajar en el campo.
Está solicitando un crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas y preparar la tierra en la que sembrara granos básicos, espera que su cosecha sea abundante y tener alimento para su familia, el resto lo podrá comercializar para generar ingresos y cumplir con sus compromisos.
Sueña con mejorar su situación económica, cancelar su deuda y dar a sus hijos mejores oportunidades de desarrollo.
texts.en:
Zoila makes a living by growing staple grains and by raising cattle. She lives with her family, which consists of her four children. She has no outside economic help. She works every day without a set timetable. She has worked in the field her whole life.
 
She is requesting a loan in order to buy farming supplies and prepare the land for sowing her staple grains. She hopes that her harvest will be abundant and that she will have food for her family. She will sell the remainder of the crops to generate income and pay her bills.

She dreams of improving her economic situation, of paying off her debt, and of giving her children better opportunities for development.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and prepare the land for sowing her staple grains. She hopes that her harvest will be abundant and that she will have food for her family

loans.name: Alex Antonio

texts.es: Alex ha sacado adelante su negocio creciendo con la ayuda de créditos que ha solicitado cada año, el es el único sustento de su familia y para poder darles más apoyo económico solicita el crédito para invertir en variedades de sandalias, lo cual podrá comprar por mayor a un mejor precio productos también invertirá en carteras de cuero y sombreros, estos dos últimos productos mencionados antes Alex no los comercializaban, ahora debido a la demanda de sus clientes hoy en día también los vende es por eso que desea tener en su inventario. Sus planes a futuro son dos proyectos muy importante para él, poner su tienda de calzados y  una pulpería en su casa que pueda atender su esposa e hijos.
texts.en:
Alex has grown his business with the help of loans he has requested each year. 

He is his family’s only support, and in order to be able to give them more financial support he is requesting a loan to invest in a variety of footwear, which he will be able to buy in bulk for better priced products including shoes, leather wallets and hats, among others.

Alex did not use to offer the last two products mentioned, but now due to customer demand today he wants to add them to his inventory.

His future plans include two projects very important to him – to put his shoe store and a small grocery store in his house so he can care for his wife and children.

loans.use: to invest in his business in order to further advance his household income

loans.name: San Martin De Tours Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “SAN MARTIN DE TOURS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Huarocondo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Elena ella es casada y tiene 50 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes , la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, leche y aceite, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar leche, azúcar, aceite y arroz.
La socias que estan pegados a la foto grupal se le tomo la fotos despues de la reunion porque pidieron permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de comida, negocio de venta de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "San Martin de Tours". This group is located in the Hurocondo district which is part of the Anta province of the department of Cusco. The member Elena is 50 years old and is married with four children. She works in her convenience store selling basic need products such as rice, sugar, milk and oil. The other members have a convenience store and a restaurant; or work selling food or animals. 

Elena works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. She has been in this business for five years and it is going very well. Her dream is to expand her convenience store. She requests the loan to purchase milk, sugar, oil and rice. She is grateful to those who support her dream through this avenue, and she promises to comply with her loan repayments within the established timeframe.

loans.use: to purchase milk, sugar, oil and rice.

loans.name: Mónica Patricia

texts.es: Ella es Mónica una mujer luchadora, emprendedora, soladora, sonriente con grandes valores, madre cabeza de familia a cargo de un niño de 10 años que es según ella el motor de su vida, como es sola busco una alternativa de trabajo en la cual pudiera generar ingresos y estar siempre al pendiente de su hijo y encontró, en la venta de ropa, calzado y accesorios ambulantemente la solución a dicho inconveniente, por ello solicita a través de un préstamo un impulso económico para comprar surtido de ropa para hombre y dama y accesorios para salir a ofertar y buscar que su hijo y ella tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: This is Mónica, a hardworking, enterprising, independent, smily mother with great values. She is a household head with a ten-year-old son who is her reason for being. She was seeking an alternative job which could generate income as she looks after her son and she has found this work in the sale of clothing, footwear, and accessories as an ambulant vendor. This job is a solution to her problems. She is requesting a loan as an economic boost to purchase an assortment of clothing for men and women and accessories to work so that she and her son can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase clothing and accessories for men and women

loans.name: Union Des Femmes Du Grand-Nord (Ufeg-Nord)

texts.en:
UFEG-North (Union Des Femmes Du Grand-Nord) is an association of women who firmly believe that the development of Haiti begins with agriculture. Eighty percent of them are making a living from agriculture: in particular, the cultivation of bananas and beans. They have representation through three municipalities of the Northern Department and have expanded their operations through all municipalities in the North. 

In the aftermath of the earthquake of January 12, 2010, this association was born under the leadership of Maniela, the coordinator. The association now has fifty members. Thanks to her motivation and the solidarity, Maniela leads a group of nine women to volunteer on behalf on the victims and further the development of Cap-Haitian. Maniela organizes meetings every Sunday to discuss general issues in community development for women in particular. Through this association, Maniela is working to improve the lives of women in the North through agriculture. 

The committee board is portrayed as follows: Mariette is the assistant coordinator, Enide is the secretary, Neltane and Rosena are advisors, Ysenie is the delegate, and Pérolie is the treasurer. They all agreed to apply for this loan through Fonkoze - Zafèn. Your contribution will reinforce the purchasing power of rural women as they will have the means to support their families during the next year. This initiative is pre-funded 25% by PADF.

loans.use: To purchase 200 pots of bean seeds, 400 banana seedlings and 80 pots of corn for farmers

loans.name: Mouvement Des Femmes En Action Pour Le Developemen

texts.en:
MOFADEB is one of the women's organizations enjoying a great reputation in Bas-Limbé because of its interventions in the agricultural sector and for women. The economy of Bas-Limbé is based mainly on primary sector activities: particularly agriculture, livestock and fishing.
