El tiene un cultivo de plátano y yuca el cual trabaja todos los días para vender sus cosechas en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Puerto Escondido.
Gracias a sus años de experiencia y enseñanzas que le dio su padre desde niño, tiene plena capacidad para trabajar y para asesorar en estos temas a los demás agricultores de la zona que necesiten ayuda con su producción. 
El solicita el crédito para comprar insumos agrícolas como fertilizantes, semillas de plátano y pesticidas, de esta manera inyectara capital a su actividad y mejorara sus cosechas de una manera significativa enfrentando la dificultad más grande que tiene que son el clima tan cambiante que afecta su cosecha.
 Tiene mucha fe en su negocio y grandes esperanzas en las personas solidarias que apoyan a los campesinos trabajadores de Colombia como lo hace la Corporación Interactuar.
Apoya a un humilde agricultor para que pueda sacar adelante sus tierras con un préstamo!
texts.en:
Jose is a veteran with a lot of experience in the countryside. He is humble and simple, he has a great gift with people and enough energy to be able to get any crop to produce. He has a plantain crop and a yuca crop which he works every day in order to sell his harvests in the plaza market of the municipality of Puerto Escondido. Thanks to his years of experience and the lessons his father gave him since he was a boy, the has the capacity to work and also to coach other farmers in the area who need help with their crops. 

Jose requests the loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides and plantain seeds. In this manner he will inject capital into his business and improve his harvests in a significant way, confronting the greatest difficulty he has which is the variable climate which affects his harvests. He has a great deal of faith in his business and puts great hope in those who, like Corporación Interactuar, are in solidarity with and support the hardworking country-folk of Colombia. Support a humble farmer so that he can improve his lands with a loan!

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies such as fertilizers, pesticides and plantain seeds.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Evelyn is 34 years old and has two children who are in school.

Evelyn has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Evelyn requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Evelyn has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Daimer David

texts.es:
Daimer, es un hombre que vive en unión libre con su pareja. 
Nació y se crió en el campo, donde aprendió las labores agrícolas al lado de su padre; gracias a ello, hoy en día tiene cultivos de platano, cuya cosecha es vendida y de esta manera obtiene los recursos para llevar el alimento a su hogar. 
El prestatario es un hombre pujante, luchador, dedicado a su familia y a su trabajo, eso lo motiva para trabajar largas jornadas y tratar de salir adelante; día a día lucha para sobrepasar los obstáculos que se le presentan, ha pasado por situaciones económicas difíciles debido al bajo precio del platano en el mercado, lo que afecta el precio de su producto. 
Daimer solicita su crédito en la Corporación Interactuar para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas), con el fin de darle continuidad a su negocio y preparar sus cultivos para cosechar un producto de muy buena calidad.
Daimer sueña con mejorar sus cultivos, ampliarlos para obtener de estos una buena renta mensual.
texts.en:
Daimer is a man who lives in a common-law marriage with his partner. Born and raised in the countryside, he learned how to work in agriculture from his father. Thanks to this, today he has banana crops. He sells the harvest and by this earns the resources to provide for his family.

The borrower is a strong man, a fighter, dedicated to his family and to his work. That motivates him to work long hours trying to get ahead. Every day, he strives to overcome the obstacles he faces. He has faced a difficult economic situation because of the low price of bananas in the market, as this affects the price of his product. 

Daimer is asking for a loan from Corporación Interactuar to invest it in the purchase of agricultural supplies (manure, fertilizers, pesticides), in order to give continuity to his business and to care for his crops and harvest a product of very good quality.

Daimer dreams of improving his crops, and of expanding them to obtain from them a good monthly income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies (manure, fertilizers, pesticides).

loans.name: Genara

texts.en:
Genara works hard to support her family. Genara is widowed and has a business selling firewood in the Philippines.

Genara requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock of firewood to sell to her customers.

Genara has been in this business for four years now.

In the future, Genara would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of firewood to sell to her customers

loans.name: Doralice

texts.es:
Doralice es una mujer de 52 años de edad, madre de dos hijos de 10 y 7 que desea iniciar un negocio de venta de mercancía básicamente ropa para hombre y dama buscando mejorar sus condiciones de vida, pues como se puede observar en la foto es muy humilde, carece de recursos pero es feliz.
Con la ayuda de este crédito podrá tener mejores entradas pues recorrerá si es necesario largas distancia a pie para vender sus productos.
texts.en: Doralice is a 52 year old woman, the mother of two children ages 10 and 7, who wants to start a business selling merchandise, mainly men's and women's clothing. She wants to improve her quality of life, which, as can be seen in the photo, is very humble. She lacks resources but she is happy. With the help of this loan, she will be able to have better options; she will, if necessary, travel long distances on foot to sell her products.

loans.use: to buy stocks of men's and women's clothing

loans.name: Genda

texts.en:
Genda is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Genda is 46 years old and has one child who is currently in school.

Genda has a food vending business in the Philippines. Genda requested a PHP 14,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Genda has been in this business for 10 years. Genda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
Víctor es un hombre que vive en una comunidad de Sololá, él tiene 24 años de edad vive al lado de su esposa unidos en matrimonio. 

Víctor es una hombre con una visión bien clara para el futuro, es una persona muy reconocida en su comunidad por el trabajo que el realiza, él es albañil construye casas muros entre otros trabajos relacionados con la albañilería. Víctor es una persona muy entregada al trabajo esto lo hace con el fin de tener lo necesario tanto para él como para su esposa. Él también tiene una segunda actividad trabaja como seguridad, con este segundo ingreso él ha podido construir su cuartito pero aun le hace falta remodelar algunas cosas, uno de los sueños de Víctor ahora es construir su cocina, pero por falta de dinero no ha sido posible. Razón por la cual él está buscando un préstamo, para empezar a construirá su cocina para que su esposa tenga un lugar donde cocinar. 
Son muchas las necesidades que se presenta en la familia de Víctor pero por ahora su prioridad es  la construcción de su cocina.
texts.en:
Victor is a man living in the Sololá community. He is 24 years old and lives with his wife. Victor is a man with a very clear vision for the future. He is very well-known in his community because of the work that he does. He is a bricklayer and builds houses, walls, and does other brick work. 

Victor is very dedicated to his job, which he performs in order to provide for himself and for his wife. He also has another job working as a security guard. He has been able to build his home with the income from his second job, but he still needs to remodel a few things. One of Victor's goals is to build a kitchen but, because of a lack of funds, he has not been able to do so, so he has sought a loan.

He would like to build a kitchen so that his wife has a place to cook. Victor's family has a lot of needs, but his current priority is to build a kitchen.

loans.use: to build a kitchen in his home.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan es un joven de 26 años de edad, él vive en una comunidad de Solola. 

Juan es una persona que le encanta trabajar, pues el a muy temprana edad se dedica al oficio de barbero, es un trabajo que le fascina hacer, porque a tiende a muchas personas de diferentes edades, él es un joven muy amable, y por su trabajo es muy reconocido por la sociedad. 

Con los prestamos que ha obtenido Juan ha podido hacer mejoras en su barbería, pero eso no es suficiente, Juan por la amabilidad con que atiende a la gente ahora es muy visitado, y el espacio con que el cuenta ya no es suficiente para atender a las personas, Para Juan los prestamos son muy buenos si uno lo sabe invertir y aprovechar, él considera que a través de los prestamos que he obtenido le ha despertado interés en recibir más capacitaciones para aprender diferentes cortes, y  asi  poder capturar mas clientes, y pagar su préstamo, ahora la barbería de Juan es muy visitado, Juan necesita un préstamo mas que le serviría para ampliar las instalaciones y hacer algunas remodelaciones de su espacio.
 
El sueño más grande de este joven es conseguir su préstamo, para que en poco tiempo su local sea cómodo y apto para sus clientes. Y otro sueño grande de Juan es comprar  su propio carro para poder trasladarse con facilidad a su lugar de trabajo. ya que él trabaja fuera de su comunidad.
texts.en:
Juan, 26, lives in Solola. He loves working and has been a barber since an early age. He has always been fascinated by this work because he has customers of many different ages. He is a very pleasant young man and his work is renowned in his community.  

With his previous loans, Juan has been able to make improvements to his place of work. However, he still needs to do more. Due to his friendly service, he now has more customers and he does not have enough room to house them all.  

He feels that the loans are very useful if you know how to invest them properly. The previous loans led to him learning how to do a wider range of cuts so he could attract more customers.  As a result, he was able to pay off his loans.  

Juan now needs a loan to extend his facilities and make some improvements to the space he already has.  

He aims to make his barber's comfortable and attractive to his customers with the help of this loan.  He also dreams of buying his own car so he can get to work more easily, as he works in a different area to where he lives.

loans.use: to refurbish his barber shop.

loans.name: Tambaya

texts.en: Tambaya K is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Tambaya K joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children Laraba and Victoria.  Before he became a Babban Gona member, Tambaya K would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Tambaya K can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Tambaya K spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: To pay for child school fees and uniforms, eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Roysber

texts.es:
Roysber un joven de tan solo 22 años que a principios del año 2014 inicio su negocio de taller de mecánica, impulsado y motivado por la gran sorpresa de que iba a hacer padre, ya su hija tiene 4 meses de edad y Royber solo espera poder brindarle todo lo que necesita para no pasar ni una necesidad y que él, junto con su pareja e hija tengan una vida digna. 

Roysber tiene un taller de mecánica básico, apenas con la herramienta básica que no le permite atender todos los casos que llegan  a su taller, es por eso que solicita un crédito  para la compra de una maquina recicladora de gas y una maquina pulidora. 
Roysber tiene el gran sueño de en unos años poder tener una casa propia, sea porque la va a pagar a cuotas, o porque la comprara de una sola cuota, pues sueña en vivir junto con su pareja e hija.
texts.en:
Roysber is a young man who is only 22 years of age. At the beginning of 2014, he started his auto repair business. He was driven and motivated after discovering with great surprise that he would become a father. His daughter is four months old and Roysber hopes to provide her with everything she needs so that she does not live a deprived life. He wants to live a decent life with his partner and daughter.

Roysber has a modest repair shop with only the basic equipment. Therefore, he is not able to resolve all of the problems that come to his shop.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan in order to buy a gas recycling machine and a polishing machine.

Roysber’s greatest wish is to own a home within a few years, either by paying in installments or in one single amount, because he dreams of living in one with his partner and daughter.

loans.use: to buy a gas recycling machine and a polishing machine.

loans.name: Lawal

texts.en:
Lawal is a maize farmer. Before he became a Babban Gona member, he would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs, such as food and clothing. 

With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Lawal can now store his maize at harvest-time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. Like other Babban Gona members, Lawal is seeking to earn a better income to provide more food and clothing for his family, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating the pressure to sell maize at low prices at harvest-time

loans.name: Joshua

texts.en: Joshua is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. Joshua joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children Musa, Hassan and Usaini.  Before he became a Babban Gona member, Joshua would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs such as food and clothing. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Joshua can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. When asked, Joshua spoke of his ambition to use the additional income to educate his children, eventually hoping to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: To pay for child school fees and uniforms, eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Shafiu Ibrahim

texts.en:
Shafiu I is a maize farmer and a member of Babban Gona. He joined Babban Gona primarily to create a better future for his children, Basiru and Inusa.  

In the past, in order to cover immediate expenses such as food and clothing, Shafiu I would typically have sold his maize soon after harvest, but at low prices. However, now that he his a member, with Babban Gona's support and help from this loan, Shafiu I can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% more. 

When asked, Shafiu I spoke of his ambition to use his additional income to educate his children, hoping to ensure his children are educated with professional jobs.

loans.use: to pay for his children's school fees and uniforms, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn for low prices at harvest.

loans.name: Mato

texts.en: Mato is a maize farmer. Before he became a Babban Gona member, Mato would have had to sell his maize for low prices soon after harvest, to cater for his immediate cash needs. With this loan and Babban Gona’s support, Mato can now store his maize at harvest time and sell it a few months later for up to 40% higher than the market price at harvest. Like other Babban Gona members, Mato is looking to earn a better income to provide more food and clothing for his family, and hopes to become the most profitable farmer in his community.

loans.use: To buy food and clothing, thereby eliminating pressure to sell corn at low prices at harvest

loans.name: Otoniel De Los Reyes

texts.es: Otoniel es un hombre esforzado que a sus 36 años lucha día a día para el bienestar de su familia, está casado y es propietario de una pulpería, este negocio lo impulsó hace veinte años por medio de la liquidación obtenida en donde laboraba, es el segundo ciclo que ADIM le brinda el financiamiento para su negocio, cuenta con la ayuda de su familia para realizar las compra y atender a los clientes, el crédito actual lo solicita para la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite, carne de res, carne de pollo, etc., de modo que le permitirá diversificar los productos ofrecido y por en de aumentar la clientela.
texts.en: Otoniel is an earnest man who at 36 years old fights day after day for his family's well-being. He is married and owner of a small grocery stores. He was inspired to open this business 20 years ago by the liquidation he received from where he worked. This is his second loan cycle with ADIM. This loan will be used to buy rice, sugar, oil, beef, chicken, etc. so that he will be able to diversify the products he sells in order to increase the number of customers.

loans.use: to buy basic groceries with the goal of offering his customers a variety of products thus increasing the number of customers.

loans.name: Marlon De Jesús

texts.es: Marlon es un hombre de 48 años de edad, se encuentra dedicado a su negocio de productos químicos, él durante muchos años fue empleado en un negocio de este mismo formato, pero al fallecer su jefe, él negocio fue desatendido y él quedó con la clientela.  Decidió iniciar su propio negocio, por lo que hoy en día es muy exitoso, gracias a la significativa experiencia que ganó en los años que fue empleado.  Él fabrica bicarbonatos, sanilí, domeboro, pesticidas y plaguicidas (sustancias químicas para exterminar algunos seres vivos considerados como plagas), sus principales clientes son las tiendas de barrio y las amas de casa, a quienes les ofrece facilidad de pago o cancelan de contado. Sus compras las realiza de contado a almacenes especializados en químicos.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará insumos para elaborar bicarbonatos, sanilí, domeboro, pesticidas y plaguicidas.  Marlon desea que su negocio crezca y con ello mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marlon is a 48-year-old man who has a chemical products business. For many years he was employed in a similar business, but when his boss passed away the business was neglected and he [Marlon] ended up with the clients. He decided to start his own business, and today he is very successful thanks to the considerable experience that he gained in his years of employment. He makes bicarbonates, "sanilí" "Domeboro" [astringent solution] and pesticides (chemical substances used to exterminate living organisms considered to be pests). His main clients are the neighbourhood shops and housewives, whom he allows to pay in instalments or in full with cash. He buys in cash from specialized chemical stores.

He is currently applying for a Kiva loan, his first financing made though the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo [Mario Santo Domingo Foundation], with which he will buy the supplies to make bicarbonates, "sanilí", "Domeboro" and pesticides. Marlon wants his business to grow so that it can allow him to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make bicarbonates, "sanilí", "Domeboro" and pesticides

loans.name: María Cecilia

texts.es:
En la ciudadela las Orquídeas de la ciudad de Portoviejo, se reúnen un  grupo de mujeres de empuje, constructoras de mejores días para su familia y el propio. Con su clima cálido y de gente amable, expertos en gastronomía. 
Aquí vive la señora Cecilia, tiene 54 años, es viuda con un hijo mayor de edad, ella  tiene casa propia. 
Ella es profesora en una escuela fiscal y es dueña de una Escuela Particular “LA MERCED”. 
Doña Cecilia se dedica a la docencia tanto en la escuela Fiscal donde trabaja como para su escuela que fue comprada hace veinte años, los créditos le han ayudado a sacar adelante a su escuela, allí trabajan siete docentes mas.
El dinero que solicito es para hacer el cerramiento para la seguridad de sus alumnos y también para materiales didácticos que son utilizados por sus queridos alumnos. Hace los créditos desde hace cuatro años y le gusta los servicios que presta la fundación y la atención que le  dan.
texts.en:
In the citadel of Las Orquídeas in the city of Portoviejo, a group of enterprising women meet. They are the creators of better days for themselves and their families. They live in a warm climate with friendly people who are experts in gastronomy. 

This is where Cecilia lives. She is 54 years old, widowed with an adult son and has her own home.

Cecilia is a teacher in a public school and owner of a private school called 'La Merced'. She has worked in teaching at both the public school where she works and the school that she bought twenty years ago. Her loans have helped her to maintain her school where seven other teachers work. 

The loan that she is applying for will be used to build an enclosure at the school for the students' safety as well as teaching materials which will be used for her beloved students. She has been taking out loans for four years and she likes the services that the foundation provides and the customer service that they offer.

loans.use: to build an enclosure and buy teaching materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a food cart to try her luck with fast food such as hot dogs, hamburgers, and french fries.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy underwear at wholesale to resell

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet works hard to support her family. She is widowed and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Janet has requested a 12,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to purchase ingredients for her food production business. She has been in this business for 10 years now.

Janet would like to build and expand her business so she can secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Jeamie

texts.en:
Jeamie works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Jeamie has requested a loan of 14,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy ingredients such as hot dogs, seasonings, meat, etc. She has been running her business for 5 years now.

In the future, Jeamie would like to save money so she can expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business such as hot dogs, seasonings, meat, etc.

loans.name: Elvin

texts.en:
Elvin lives in a community in the Department of Intibucá Honduras. He works at the Foundation Save the children since 3 years ago. Aged 27, he is unmarried and has one child. It is clear that Elvin works hard to maintain his family and at night, after a hard day of work, the conditions in the house are not very good due to the lack of electricity. He hopes that with the solar energy system, his child will be able to continue studying and improve the living conditions.

Elvin is requesting a loan to purchase a complete solar electric system from SOLUZ Honduras, that will permit to have a better lighting, charge his cell phones, and saving in traditional energy expenditure.

loans.use: to purchase a solar home system

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to have PV systems installed in their houses.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a married mother of 8 children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 47 years old, and 3 of her children are currently in school.

Imelda has a tailoring business in the Philippines. She has requested a loan of 13,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to purchase additional materials such as fabric, thread, zippers, etc.

Imelda has been running her business for 6 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her business such as fabric, thread, zippers, etc.

loans.name: Dalgys Judith

texts.es: Dalgys una hermosa mujer de 31 años de edad, madre preocupada, protectora, celosa, de dos hijos que ha sabido levantar empleándose en diferentes negocios, ahora que se le presenta la oportunidad de ser independiente quiere tomarla, por tal razón solicita una ayuda para iniciar su negocio de papelería iniciara de 0, comprara surtido y estanterías, es un negocio que ayudara mucho a su zona, afectada por la pobreza, donde el común de casas son hechas de madera.
texts.en:
Dalgys, 31, is a lovely woman, a concerned, protective, and vigilant mother of two children she has been able to raise by working in various businesses. Now that she has the opportunity to work independently, she wants to take advantage of it.

For that reason she's requesting a loan to start her stationery shop business from the ground up. She's going to buy supplies and shelving.

It's a business that will help a lot in her area, which is affected by poverty and where most houses are built of wood.

loans.use: to start her own stationery shop

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.es:
Marcelo es un hombre casado de 48 años, vive junto a su esposa y sus cinco hijos todos estudian en la escuela de la comunidad donde vive.

Marcelo desde muy pequeño empezó con el oficio de ser agricultor, tiene una experiencia de casi 20 años, él siembre diversidad de hortalizas, y lo hace desde su comunidad, a pesar de la escases económica, don Marcelo lucha cada día con sus hijos en cubrirles el estudio y darle el pan de cada día. Marcelo no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos, él junto a su esposa han decidió buscar un préstamo para comprar insumos para sus hortalizas, ya que con el poco capital que tienen no es suficiente, porque el año escolar inicia nuevamente y esto lo utilizaran para la inscripción de sus hijos. Para tener una buena cosecha es necesario darle mantenimiento a la siembra.

Marcelo es un hombre con muy buenos hábitos y principios  él madruga para ir a trabajar en su agricultura, Marcelo anhela conseguir su préstamo ya que solo así puede seguir sembrando y darle una mejor vida a su familia
texts.en:
Marcelo, 48, is married and lives with his wife and five children who all study in the community school where they live.
When Marcelo was little, he started to learn the work of a farmer.  He has almost twenty years of experience.  He plants a variety of vegetables and he does it in his community.  Despite the scarce economic resources, Marcelo struggles everyday to cover the studies of his children and to provide them with food every day.  Marcelo has no other source of income.  He along with his wife have decided to seek a loan to buy supplies for his vegetables since the little capital they have is insufficient and, because the school year will start again, they will use this to sign their children up.  In order to have a good harvest, it is necessary to maintain the crop.
Marcelo is a man with good habits and principles.  He gets up early in order to go work in his agriculture.  Marcelo is eager to obtain his loan since only in this way can he continue planting and give his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Henry José

texts.es: Henry es un hombre laborioso que tiene la edad de 29 años, casado, su negocio es el destace de cerdo que lo impulsó hace cinco años de la liquidación obtenida de la empresa donde laboraba, es primer ciclo que solicita en ADIM el financiamiento para su negocio, y lo invertirá en la compra de doce cerdos pequeños en pies, con el objetivo de aumentar los productos ofrecidos.
texts.en: Henry is a hard-working 29 year old man. He is married. He has had a business for 5 years butchering pigs, which he started with the liquidation he received from a business where he was working. This is his first loan cycle for his business with ADMIN, and he will buy 12 live pigs with the goal of increasing the products offered.

loans.use: to buy 12 live pigs which will enable him to increase the products offered.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El comité Kuña Guapa se formo en la ciudad de Santaní, con un grupo de mujeres muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, ellas son de una zona bastante alejada de la capital del país, y que están mejorando y luchando por poder crecer.
 La señora Juana, es muy guapa, trabaja como empleada doméstica y quiere poder conseguir un nuevo método para poder mejorar sus ingresos y ayudar a su familia. Juana lucha por un mejor futuro para su familia, ya que no quiere que pase por ningún tipo de privaciones como los que ha tenido que pasar ella.
Pide este préstamo para montar un copetín de ventas de comidas en su casa aprovechando sus tardes libres para generar más ingresos pudiendo así sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
The Kuña Guapa group was formed in the city of Santaní by a group of very hardworking and enterprising women. They live in an area which is quite far away from the capital of the country that they are striving to grow and improve.

Juana is very beautiful and works as a maid. She would like to find a new way of improving her income and helping her family. Juana is striving to provide a better future for her family as she doesn't want them to go through any of the deprivation that she had to go through. 

Juana is applying for a loan to set up a snack food stand in her home so she can take advantage of her free afternoons and generate more income to bring up her family.

loans.use: to set up a snack food stand

loans.name: Blanca Estela

texts.es:
Blanca, requiere de un nuevo crédito para comprar camisas, pantalones, faldas, etc., ofertara mejores prendas de vestir con el fin de suplir las necesidades de sus clientes y seguir teniendo una fuente de ingresos.
La ayuda que los inversionistas Kiva le brindaron con el préstamo anterior la ha dado un impacto positivo en su negocio, atrajo nuevos clientes y las condiciones de vida familiar son mucho más dignas.
texts.en:
Blanca is requesting a new loan in order to purchase shirts, pants, skirts, etc.  She will offer better garments in order to supply the needs of her customers and continue having a source of income.

The help that the Kiva lenders gave her with the previous loan has had a positive impact on her business—she attracted new customers, and her family’s living conditions are much better.

loans.use: to purchase shirts, pants, skirts, etc., and offer better garments.

loans.name: Joecel

texts.en:
Joecel is a married mother of 5 children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She is 39 years old, and 5 of her children are currently in school.

Joecel has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a 13,000 PHP loan through Negros for Women Tomorrow Foundation in order to purchase ingredients for her business. He has been in this business for 20 years now. 

In the future, Joecel would like to save enough money to be able to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es: Moisés de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino desde hace 15 años, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, está solicitando un crédito para la compra de una vaca y así poder seguir con su producción para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Moisés is 58 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He has raised livestock for 15 years and sells his products in the outskirts of the area where he lives. 

Moisés is applying for a loan to buy a cow so that he can continue his production and earn a better living.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener  20 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de frutas (sandias, melón y piñas) desde hace 2 años, su negocio está ubicado en el mercado municipal y ya tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios, la joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas frutas por mayor y así poder seguir con sus ventas y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
This young woman's face has been pixelated because she is 20 years old and lives in a high risk area. She has sold fruit (watermelon, melon and pineapple) for two years. Her business is located at the town market and she has many customers due to her good prices. She lives in her own home with her family. 

This young woman is applying for a loan to buy more fruit in bulk so she can continue to make sales and earn a higher income.

loans.use: to buy fruit in bulk

loans.name: Griselda Cristabel

texts.es:
Griselda, de 20 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado, no pudo seguir estudiando porque no hay bachillerato en el centro escolar de su comunidad.- Actualmente, está soltera, y vive con su madre y un hermano. 

Griselda, trabaja como doméstica en una casa de su comunidad, pero también, tiene una venta de saldo de teléfono de diferentes compañías, la casa donde trabaja está ubicada a 10 minutos de su vivienda, se va caminando y su horario es de 6:00 a.m. a 6:00 p.m.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una ternera y para pagar una deuda de su madre; la ternera la crecerá y luego la venderá. 

Griselda, espera que la ternera se desarrolle y en un futuro poderla vender y generar ganancias, para poder invertir en más ganado.
texts.en: Griselda is 20 years old and completed 9th grade. She couldn't continue in school because there wasn't a high school in her community.  Today, she is single and lives with her mother and a brother. Griseld works as a domestic employee in a house in her community, but also she sells phone cards of different companies.  The house where she works is located 10  minutes from her home, and she walks to work, working from 6 AM until 6 PM. The loan will be used to buy a calf and to pay a debt her mother owes. The calf will grow and will later be sold. Griselda hopes that the calf grows well and in the future she will be able to sell it and generate income in order to be able to invest in more cattle.

loans.use: to buy a calf and pay a debt of her mother owes.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 29 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la crianza de cerdo y los comercializa en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, la joven vive en casa propia con su esposo y esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de 8 cerdos, harina de soya y concentrado para la alimentación y asi poder seguir con su trabajo y poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
This young woman's face has been pixelated because she is 29 years old and lives in a high risk area. She raises pigs and sells them in the different markets close to her house. She lives in her own home with her husband.

This young woman is applying for a loan to buy eight pigs, soy flour and feed concentrate so that she can continue working and have a higher income.

loans.use: to buy eight pigs

loans.name: Manuela De Los Angeles

texts.es: Manuela de 53 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hermana y sus dos hijo, ella se dedica desde hace 16 años a la siembra de maíz, cuando ya esta lista su cosecha la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarlos, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que le ha ido muy bien en sus ventas y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuela is 53 years old and lives in her own home with her sister and her two children. She has been sowing corn for 16 years. When it is ready she stores her harvest in the granary that you can see in the photo which she will sell later on. 

Maneula is applying for another loan to buy seeds, fertiliser, compost, pest control, herbicides, etc. She would like to continue growing her crops as they have sold very well and with them she can obtain a higher income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertiliser, compost, pest control, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Coronado

texts.es:
Coronado, de 58 años de edad, estudio hasta 6° grado, está acompañado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios del hogar, tienen 3 hijos y sola la última vive con ellos y estudia 1° grado. 

Coronado, tiene una pequeña tienda desde hace 15 años; además, se dedica la a venta de materiales reciclados desde hace 2 años.- La tienda la tiene en su casa y su esposa le ayuda, el horario de atención es de 7:00 a.m. a 8:00 p.m.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar artículos para vender en la tienda y para hacer algunas reparaciones que necesita su camión.

El sueño de Coronado, es que su negocio crezca; también, desea colocar un negocio de venta de ropa, todo para mejorar sus ganancias y darle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
58-year-old Coronado studied up until the sixth grade. His partner does the household chores. They have three children and only the youngest, a girl, lives with them. She’s in the first grade.

Coronado has had a small store for the last 15 years. He has also sold recycled materials for the last two years. The store is located in his house and his wife helps him. The store is open from 7:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.

He needs the loan in order to buy items to sell in his store and to make some necessary repairs to his truck.

Coronado’s dream is for his business to grow. He also wants to set up a clothing store. All of this is to improve his profits so he can provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in his store and to make some necessary repairs to his truck

loans.name: Joanina

texts.en: Joanina, 47, started farming 24 years ago when he got married to her husband Samuel. She loves farm animals for the social and economic benefits they provide. Currently, she has two cows and five heads of poultry on her one-acre farm. She also owns a motorbike that she uses for transporting farm goods and passengers over short distances. One of the major challenges that Joanina faces is lack of adequate feed for her cows. This challenge usually results in poor health for her animals and lowered milk production. In severe cases, it may lead to death of the animal due to illnesses caused by malnutrition. She is seeking a loan to secure adequate feed for her farm animals. Your support will not only help make Joanina's animals grow healthy and fat but also improve her level of income due to increased production of milk and other products. Joanina's long-term goal is to uplift her family's livelihood and elevate its quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for animal feed.

loans.name: Lali

texts.en:
Lali is 25 years old and lives in the small village of Koki, which is in the Zugdidi district. She has a five-member family including her infant son, and they lack significant income to live on. The family belongs to the subsistence poor category and lives in poverty. It gets social assistance from the local government and, apart from this, they have a small farm. They own nut trees, three cows and a pig, and sell cheese and grown pigs at the local market. 

Lali has a great desire to do her bit for her family's welfare, and to somehow increase its income. To realize her plans she requires financial support and has requested a loan from Credo to start a trading business. Her loan request was approved within the framework of a joint initiative by Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program provisions business start-ups and restart-up credits with easy terms for the country's rural poor, who are regarded as "high risk borrowers" because of their low income, and lack of access to credit products. 

With this loan, she will start selling clothes, and her husband will help her. They will buy clothes from Tbilisi at wholesale prices, and sell them in nearby towns for a markup. This new business initiative, financed with the Kiva start-up loan, will significantly increase the family's income. Their income will double, and the family members will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to begin selling clothes.

loans.name: Gjovalin

texts.en: Here we see Gjovalin with Preng, his son, who he is requesting this loan for. Preng had an accident when he was 14 years old: while he was walking in the forest, hunters accidentally shot his leg just below the knee and this damaged his shin. So far, he had had five operations, but none has succeeded. Gjovalin is seeking this loan to pay for a visit to a specialist who promises a better outcome. He is praying that this time the outcome is positive, and is grateful for your assistance.

loans.use: to pay for his son's surgery.

loans.name: Fizan

texts.en: Fizan  is 48 years old and married. The man shown in the photo is her son, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years as a way to meet the family expenses, but now this rickshaw requires proper maintenance to keep it functional. For this reason, Fizan has applied for a loan for 45,000 PKR so that her son can get new tires for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Fizan hopes that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to upgrade her son's vehicle.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia es una mujer exitosa en su vida laboral, tiene la edad de 32 años, acompañada y se dedica a la comercialización de CD y accesorios para celular en el mercado municipal desde hace ocho años, es el noveno ciclo que solicita a ADIM el financiamiento para su negocio y ha demostrado ser una persona cumplida, cuenta con la ayuda de dos trabajadores que son remunerados, el crédito actual lo solicita para la compra de carcasas, audífonos, cargadores, parlantes pequeños, reproductores, protectores, etc., con los créditos anteriores ha logrado aumentar la mercadería que ofrece, una de sus metas es seguir diversificando los productos ofrecidos.
texts.en: Sonia is a successful woman in her work life. She is 32 years old, has a partner, and has made a living for the past eight years by selling CDs and cell phone accessories at the local market. This is her ninth loan cycle with ADIM. The financing is for her business and she has shown herself to be a polite person. She has the help of two workers, who are paid for their work. She is requesting the current loan in order to buy cases, headphones, chargers, small loudspeakers, CD players, protectors, etc. With the previous loans she has managed to increase the merchandise that she offers. One of her goals is to continue diversifying the products she offers.

loans.use: to buy CDs and cell phone accessories in order to meet the demand for these products

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem  is 43 years old, married and the mother of four children. In order to help her husband take care of their family, she went into the business of milk selling. She is now known in her town for providing good quality milk, and owns buffaloes that she uses to produce her milk. She happily supports her family with the income generated, and has requested for a loan for 55,000 PKR  to buy another buffalo so that she can increase her sales and generate more income to cover her daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy a  buffalo.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair a motorcycle to have his work equipment in perfect condition to go out to sell bread

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru:
Хасан трудолюбивый мужчина 36 лет. Он женат и имеет четырех  детей.  Хасан  живет в сельской местности и занимается выращиванием сельхозкултур.  В основном он выращивает лук, кукурузы, зерно и другие сельхозкультуры. Хасан сам мастер по строительству. Его дополнительным семейным доходом является откорм скота.  Его жена и дочь помогают ему. 
Хасан около 4 лет сотрудничает с  МДО Арванд. Он обратился за кредитом  для покупки семян лука. Он заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Hasan is a hardworking 36-year-old man. He is married with four children. 

Hasan lives in the country and farms, mostly onions, corn, wheat and other crops. He is also an experienced builder. His supplementary family income comes from fattening cattle. Hasan's wife and daughter help him. 

For about four years, he has worked with MDO Arvand. Hasan took a loan to buy onion seeds. He gives thanks in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Juanita

texts.en: Juanita is married and works hard to support her family by selling vegetables in the Philippines. She has requested a loan for PHP 14,000 from NWTF to buy more produce to sell to her customers. Juanita has been in this business for six years, and would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ILLARY III,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el  negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz,azúcar,leche entre otros, la socia  lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajado para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicito el crédito para la compra de arroz, gaseosas entre otros.
La socia agradece los inversionistas  y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “Illary III”. She alternates her daily activities with her grocery store business. She sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, and milk, among other things. The member has had this business for quite some time, and she does well as a result of the effort that she puts forth every day. The member wishes to continue working because this way, she can continue supporting her family.

The member is requesting a loan to buy rice and sodas, among other things. She gives thanks to the lenders and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy rice and sodas, among other things.

loans.name: Judeven

texts.en: Judeven is 37 years old, married and the mother of four children, all of whom are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur who earns a living by selling fruits and vegetables in the Philippines. Judeven has requested a PHP 11000 loan from NWTF to buy more produce to sell. She earns additional income by running a general store. She successfully paid back her previous loan and is requesting a new one to further build up her business. Judeven has been in her current line of work for ten years, and her goal for the future is to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Madelyn

texts.en:
Madelyn is 33 years old and married. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Madelyn has a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Madelyn requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Madelyn has been in this business for four years. Madelyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Marivic

texts.en:
Marivic is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fruit and vegetable vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell to her customers for her fruit and vegetable vending business.

Marivic has been in this business for 10 years. Marivic earns more income from farming banana.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

Marivic has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more fruits and vegetables to sell to her customers

loans.name: Melodia

texts.en:
Melodia is single and has a wood craft business in the Philippines.

Melodia requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy more materials for her business.

Melodia has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Melodia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her business

loans.name: Savoeurn

texts.en:
Savoeurn, who is 37 years old, is living in a community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has eight children in total. To support the family, she works very hard on her own rice farmland, by growing and selling the crops to the local dealers and customers in the market. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 5.00 a day.

As a supplement to her income, she came up with a new business idea.  She wants to raise cows for sale. However, her insufficient capital investment doesn't allow her to do so. Therefore, she is applying for a Kiva loan to buy cows. She hopes that this new trade will help to improve her standard of living. She is thankful to all the lenders for their financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Nasim

texts.ru:
Насим жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина 47 лет. Он уроженец  древнего города Истаравшан.  Насим  женат  и имеет  4х детей. Насим  мастер. Он работает на стройке. У него дружная семья. Они живут в доме, который построили сами. Дети  помогают своему отцу.
 Насим с женой решили о судьбе своего старшого сына и хотели его женить. Он готовиться к свадебному мероприятию. Для этого нужно купить очень много вещей для приданного. Но у Насима не хватает денежных средств, которые он накопил для свадьбы. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку приданного для свадьбы своего сына. Насим очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку
texts.en:
Nasim is a good-humored and hardworking man of 47. He is a native son of the ancient city of Istaravshan. Nasim is married with four children. He is an experienced builder with a close-knit family. 

His family lives in a house which they built themselves. Nasim's children help their father. He and his wife arranged their eldest son's marriage and want to help him prepare for a wedding. 

They need to buy many things for the dowry. But Nasim does not have enough money saved for the wedding. Thus he approached Arvand and wants to take a loan to prepare for his son's wedding. Nasim hopes very much to receive the money and thanks Arvand in advance.

loans.use: to provide a dowry for his son's wedding.

loans.name: Rukhsat

texts.ru:
Рухсат трудолюбивая женщина 53 лет. Она замужем и имеет пятерых детей. Она очень жизнерадостная  женщина,  любит  свою семью и старается для благополучия своей семьи. У них есть свой семейный бизнес. Её муж Туйчибой пекарь. Он печет лепешки. Рухсат продает их на местном рынке. Их сын помогает им. Их бизнес приносит им хороший доход. 
Рухсат сотрудничает с МДО Арванд с 2011 года. На этот раз она хочет получить кредит для расширение их бизнеса. 
Она заранее благодарит Арванд  и говорит: «Спасибо за поддержку и доверие!»
texts.en:
Rukhsat is a hardworking 53-year-old woman. She is married with five children. Rukhsat is a sanguine woman who loves her family and strives to provide for them. 

They have a family business--Rukhsat's husband is a baker, making cakes that she sells in the local market. Their son helps them. Their business brings in a good income. Since 2011, Rukhsat has worked with MDO Arvand, and now wants to take a loan to expand their business. She thanks Arvand in advance and says, "Thank you for the support and trust in me!"

loans.use: to buy flour.

loans.name: Victoriano Marciano

texts.es: Victoriano de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar el se dedica desde hace 10 años a la apicultura comercializa sus productos en la agencias de compra-venta de miel de abeja y ya tiene clientes establecidos, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de azúcar por quintales para poder seguir con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Victoriano, 52, lives in his own home with his family group.  He's been working as a beekeeper for 10 years.  He sells his products to the wholesale honey distributors, and he already has established customers.  He is requesting this loan to buy 100 lb. sacks of sugar so that he can continue with his work and increase his income.

loans.use: to buy 100 lb. sacks of sugar

loans.name: Nanuli

texts.en: Nanuli is 50 years old, hard working and lives in the Tsalka district. She has six people in her family and their main source of income is from a stationary store. She is also a tailor and takes private orders. In order to increase her income and provide better living conditions for her family, Nanuli wants to renovate the house she owns and open a hotel.  She has received pre-approval for a loan in the framework of joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, whose  Startup Program gives people a chance to start or re-start a businesses. This loan for 9,000 GEL will give her a chance to make good accommodations in her hotel and start serving customers.This will allow her to increase her income by 200 percent, which will mean better living conditions for her family. She is grateful for your support and kindness.

loans.use: to earn more income by opening a hotel.

loans.name: Narcisa

texts.en:
Narcisa is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Narcisa is 44 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Narcisa has a rug-making business in the Philippines. Narcisa requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more materials for her rug-making business.

Narcisa has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, Narcisa would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her rug-making business

loans.name: Nerissa

texts.en:
Nerissa is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Nerissa is 36 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Nerissa has a barber shop business in the Philippines. Nerissa requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional materials and tools for her business.

Nerissa has been in this business for six years. In the future, Nerissa would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials and tools for her business

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda works hard to support her family. Nilda is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Nilda requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more materials for her tailoring business.

Nilda has been in this business for six years now.

Nilda would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more materials for her tailoring business

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Susan is 43 years old and has four children who are in school.

Susan has a food vending business in the Philippines. Susan requested a PHP 16,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Susan has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Susan would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 46 years old and married with six children. With four children currently in school, Teresa works very hard to provide for them.

Teresa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like noodles, detergent soap, canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, etc. to sell.

Teresa has been in this business for 16 years and sells a variety of items such as noodles, detergent soap, canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, etc. 

In the future, Teresa would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items like noodles, detergent soap, canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, etc. to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase new pants, blouses, shirts, and t-shirts

loans.name: Coronita De Mavati Group

texts.es:
Las integrantes del grupo "Coronita de Mavati" son mujeres mazahuas, viven en una comunidad donde aún conservan sus tradiciones incluso ellas se comunican en su lengua materna, situación que no sucede en otras comunidades aledañas. 

Doña Matilde es la represtante del grupo, tiene 41 años de edad y está casada con el señor Hermenegildo quien trabaja en el campo, juntos han formado un familia con cinco hijos de los cuales ya solo uno depende de ellos y estudia su educación primaria.

Hace 8 años Doña Matilde comenzó a crear artesanías bordadas como servilletas, manteles, etc. “Mis hijos eran muy pequeños, mi esposo trabajaba solo en el campo y su sueldo era muy bajo así que decidí ayudar con lo que mejor sé hacer y que además me fascina". Desde pequeña, Doña Matilde observaba a su abuela y a su mamá elaborando servilletas bordadas para envolver las tortillas y conservarlas calientes. Recuerda que solo las elaboraban para uso propio y a Doña Matilde se le ocurrió que sería una muy buena opción ofrecerlas a las amas de casa que simplemente no tienen tiempo para elaborarlas. Su trabajo ha sido reconocido en su comunidad por la calidad y la puntualidad de las entregas cuando le hacen pedidos grandes para celebraciones y fiestas. Hace algunos días entregó recuerdos para una boda y las ganancias las utilizó para comprar más comida para su familia. 

Matilde ocupa sus tardes para bordar una vez que ha terminado sus actividades del hogar. A pesar de que este es el segundo ciclo en que solicita un préstamo a VisionFund, está agradecida porque podrá comprar tela, aros, agujas, hilos y estambres de varios colores para continuar realizando lo que tanto ama. Además comenta que el préstamo anterior le permitió invertir en animales como pollos y pavos que está a punto de vender y tendrá un poco más de dinero para su familia. 

Matilde tiene un nuevo plan en mente, le gustaría mejorar el gallinero que tiene para comenzar a vender los huevos que lleguen a poner sus gallinas. Sin embargo su más grande sueño es continuar incrementando sus ventas para hacer algunas mejoras a su vivienda. 

Así como Doña Matilde, las demás integrantes del grupo están muy contentas y agradecidas con el préstamo porque lo podrán invertir en sus negocios, Doña Eleuteria, Felipa y Mariana invertirán en servilletas, mientras que Silvia y Sofía invertirán en pollos.

*La fotografía fue tomada en las escaleras del quiosco del municipio, detrás de las integrantes se puede apreciar una parte de la iglesia católica. Doña Matilde es quien esta sentada justo en medio de las demás*
texts.en:
The members of the "Coronita de Mavati" group are Mazahua women who live in a community in which they still maintain their traditions. They even talk to each other in their mother tongue, a situation that does not happen in other neighbouring communities.

Matilde is the group's representative. She is 41 years old and is married to Hermenegildo, who makes a living working in the fields. Together, they have formed a family with five children, only one of whom is their dependant and goes to elementary school.

Eight years ago, Matilde began making embroidered handicrafts such as napkins, tablecloths, and the like. "My children were very young; my husband used to work in the fields alone, and his pay was too low, so I decided to help out with what I do best, and which I also love," [she says.]

From a very young age, Matilde used to watch her grandmother and her mother make embroidered napkins to wrap tortillas to keep them warm. She remembers that they only used to make them for their personal use, and Matilde came up with the idea that it would be a very good option to offer them to the homemakers who were too busy to make them. 

She has been recognized in her community for the quality of her work and the punctuality with which she delivers large orders for celebrations and parties. A few days ago, she delivered some wedding souvenirs, and she used the profits to buy more food for her family.

Matilde spends her evenings embroidering once she has finished her household chores. Even though this is the second time that she is requesting a loan from VisionFund, she is grateful because she will be able to buy fabric, embroidery hoops, needles, thread, and yarn in an assortment of colours to keep on doing what she so much loves to do. In addition, she says that the previous loan allowed her to invest in the purchase of animals such as chickens and turkeys, which she is about to sell, and, in this way, she will have a little extra money for her family.

Matilde has a new plan in mind. She would like to improve the coop she has in order to start selling the eggs that her hens may lay. However, her greatest dream is to continue increasing her sales to be able to make improvements to her home.

Like Matilde, the other group members are very happy and grateful for the loan because they will be able to invest it in their businesses. Eleuteria, Felipa, and Mariana will invest in napkins while Silvia and Sofía will invest in chickens.

*The photograph was taken on the stairs of the municipal bandstand. Behind the group members, part of the Catholic church can be seen. Matilde is the one sitting right in the middle of the group*

loans.use: to buy fine-checked fabric, thread, needles, and the like.

loans.name: Los Urpichas De Huancaro Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LOS URPICHAS DE HUANCARO”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yanet ella es soltera y tiene 26 años; La socia se dedica al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azucar, leche y galletas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar arroz, azucar, leche y galletas.


Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de verduras, negocio de venta de animales, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.
texts.en:
These individuals belong to the communal bank "Los Urpichas de Huancaro."  This group is located in the district of Cusco, which is in the province and department of the same name. 

Yanet is a member of this group.  She is single and is 26 years old.  Yanet has a grocery store business.  She sells consumer staples such as: rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.  She works from 8am until 7pm, and she has 5 years of experience with her business, which is doing very well.  Yanet's dream is to expand her grocery store business.  She is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies.

The other members of this group have businesses such as: vegetable sales, animal sales, a grocery store, and a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, and cookies

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Hello lenders, meet Jane. She is a 42-year-old smallholder farmer based in Kerugoya, which is a small rural town in Central Kenya. Jane and her husband have been blessed with two children. For 10 years Jane has been a mixed farmer. She keeps dairy cattle and poultry on her farm. She also grows maize, among other crops. Despite prevailing animal diseases, she finds dairy farming to be the most enjoyable commercial farming activity. Besides dairy farming, she has a deep connection with gardening. In African communities, gardening is the most popular, yet the least exclusive, hobby for women. You really don't have to be born with a green thumb to give life to a glorious garden; any woman with a homestead and a few square feet of earth is doing her best to make her little corner of the world more gracious and beautiful. Jane, however, is taking this a little step further 

Jane is seeking a loan to start horticultural farming. This is a big deal for her. She is very excited to start growing different varieties of crops for commercial purposes. The demand for vegetables and other greens is always high. Income from this venture will cover the high farming expenses she has to deal with currently. In the long run, with increased income, she will finally be able to satisfy her family’s basic needs.

loans.use: To start horticulture farming

loans.name: Fehmida

texts.en:
Fehmida is a 54-year-old married woman. She has four children. Fehmida is very skilled in the art of hand embroidery and has been using this skill for many years to earn a living. She can make beautiful designs and patterns by hand. Her skill is known throughout the town. 

She has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR. This loan will enable her to purchase more beads, threads, and frames to meet the orders of her customers on time and earn a good amount of profits. This monetary help can take Fehmida closer to her dream of providing a quality education for her children.

loans.use: to purchase more beads, threads, and frames to meet the orders of her customers on time

loans.name: Mijgona

texts.ru: Мичгона у себя дома профессионально занимается шитьем на протяжении более 3 лет. Она научилась этой професии самостоятельно. Хотя Мичгона имеет высшее образование, но по специальности еще не работала. Ей сейчас удобно работать дома, так как дети еще маленькие. В возрасте 29 лет Мичгона уже замужем и имеет двух маленьких детей. Ее муж как и многие мужчины Таджикистана работает в России в качестве трудового мигранта. Мичгона живет в городе Душанбе с детьми и  матерью. Она по заказу шьет женские нациоанальные платья и ее услуга всегда востребована. Мичгона приобрела достаточный опыт в этой сфере и теперь решила расширить свой малый бизнес. Она за счет кредита хочет купить компьютерную швейную машинку и сможет достичь своей цели только благодаря вашей поддержки.
texts.en:
Mijgona has had her own sewing business at home for more than three years. She is self-taught. She has a high school education but has not worked in her area of specialization. She finds it convenient to work at home while her children are still young. 

Mijgona is 29 years old and already married with two small children. Her husband, like many men in Tajikistan, works in Russia as a migrant worker. Mijgona lives in the city of Dushanbe with her children and mother. 

She sews traditional women's dresses on commission and her services are much in demand. She has sufficient experience in this field to now want to expand her small business. She wants to take a loan to buy a computerized sewing machine. She will only be able to reach her goal with your support.

loans.use: to buy a computerized sewing machine to expand her sewing business.

loans.name: Tita

texts.en:
Tita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a buy and sell ready to wear business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy more stock of ready to wear to sell to her customers for her buy and sell ready to wear business.

Tita has been in this business for 20 years. Tita earns more income from selling herbal soap and purchase order cards.

Tita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock  of ready to wear to sell to her customers

loans.name: Jose Rigoberto

texts.es:
José, de 24 años de edad, estudió hasta bachillerato, no continuo con sus estudios debido a la falta de recursos de sus padres; está acompañado desde hace 3 años, su compañera de vida se dedica a los oficios del hogar y a cuidar a su bebe recién nacido.

José, se destaca en el área de investigación de la fuerza armada de El Salvador desde hace dos anos, decidió dedicarse a este trabajo ya que siempre anhelo ser un militar.- Anteriormente, él se dedicaba a sembrar granos básicos como, maíz, frijol y arroz.
 

José, necesita el crédito para comprar 1,500 tejas, madera y ademas necesita dinero para pagar mano de obra, todo para reconstruir parte de su casa.

 	
José, en un futuro desea tener una casa que reúna las condiciones básicas, para que su  familia viva en un ambiente agradable, cómodo y seguro.
texts.en:
Jose is 24 years old. He studied through high school and did not continue due to his parents' lack of resources. 

He has been in a relationship for three years with his life partner. She takes care of the household duties and of their newborn child.

Jose stands out in the area of investigations as part of the Armed Forces of El Salvador. Two years ago, he decided to get involved in this work because he'd always aspired to be in the military. 

Previously, he worked in agriculture growing basic grains such as corn, beans and rice.

He needs the loan to buy 1500 tiles and wood, and he also needs to pay for labor to rebuild part of his home.

In the future, Jose would like to have a home providing basically a nice, comfortable, and safe living environment for his family.

loans.use: to buy 1500 tiles and wood, and to pay for labor to rebuild part of his home.

loans.name: Shenaz

texts.en: Shenaz is a 45-year-old married woman. The man shown in the photo is Shenaz’s son, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family's expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it functional. For this reason, Shenaz has applied for a loan of 50,000 PKR for her son. He wants to buy new tires and some spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Shenaz is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and spare parts for her son's vehicle.

loans.name: Yesica Del Carmen

texts.es: Yesica se dedica al cultivo de maíz desde hace varios años, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en sacos como muestra la fotografía, para luego comercializarlas, vive en casa propia con sus hijos y su compañero de vida, ella está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas,herbicidas, etc. para continuar con sus cultivos ya que le ha ido bien en los últimos meses y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Yesica has farmed corn for several years. When her harvest is ready, she collects it in sacks, as shown in the photograph, to sell them. She lives in her own house with her children and her life partner. 

She is asking for a loan again in order to buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, etc. to continue her farming, because it has been going well for the last few months. That way, she will have a better income.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, pesticides, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Melba Celina

texts.es: Melba es una microempresaria de 32 años de edad, acompañada, comerciante de ropa nueva y calzado en algunos departamentos del país, este negocio lo impulsó hace cuatro años, y es primer ciclo que solicita le crédito en ADIM  para invertir en pantalones, camisetas, blusas, talladores, licras, mosquiteros, etc., permitiéndole cubrir la demanda que tiene en esta temporada, una de sus metas es abrir nuevos mercados.
texts.en: Melba, 32, is a businesswoman. She has a companion and sells new clothing and shoes in some of the country's departments. She started this business four years ago and this is the first loan she is requesting from ADIM to invest in pants, t-shirts, blouses, girdles, lycra, mosquito nets, etc., which will allow her to cover the high demand she has at this time. One of her goals is to open new markets.

loans.use: buy new clothing and shoes to sell as this is the season of highest demand.

loans.name: Ariel Josué

texts.es:
Ariel, de 30 años de edad, estudió hasta 9° grado, está acompañado y su pareja es comerciante en pequeño, tienen 1 hija.

Ariel, es empleado en una constructora y su cargo es en estructuras metálicas.- La distancia para llegar a su trabajo es de 15 minutos en bicicleta y el horario es de 7:00 a.m. a 4:00 p.m. todos los días. 

Además, de ser empleado, Ariel adquirió un contrato con el centro escolar de su comunidad para que colocara un cafetín dentro del centro.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar golosinas, bebidas, dulces, entre otros. Su pareja y su mamá son las que administran el cafetín. 

Ariel, espera que el negocio de los resultados esperados y genere buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Ariel, 30 years old, studied until the 9th grade.  He lives in a common-law marriage and his wife is a part-time storekeeper.  They have one daughter. Ariel is employed as a constructor and his position involves metallic structures.  The distance to arrive at his work is 15 minutes on bicycle.  His schedule is from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm every day. 

Aside from being employed, Ariel acquired a contract with the school in his community so that he could add a café inside the school.  He needs the loan to buy candy, drinks and sweets, among other things.  His wife and his mother run the café.  Ariel hopes that the business produces the expected results and that it generates good earnings.

loans.use: to buy candy, drinks and sweets, among other things for a cafe in which his mother and his wife work

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
For the last seven years, Jane has operated her small business in the community of Estancia in Iloilo. She sells snack food, candies, biscuits, seasoning, bread and canned goods to customers in her community. This is to support her two sons, ages 13 and 19.

Jane is 44 years old and, together with her husband, works hard for their family. Aside from the sari-sari store, they also operate a catering business where they accept orders for food on different occasions.

Jane has asked for a 20,000 PHP loan from CEVI to expand her business. She would like to buy more canned goods, noodles, candies, seasoning and toiletries. The increased income from the additional investment will be used to pay school fees, buy food for her family and reinvest in the same business.

loans.use: to buy more canned goods, noodles, candies, seasoning and toiletries

loans.name: Leonila Alexandra

texts.es:
Portoviejo también ofrece a los turistas nacionales y extranjeros una gran variedad de la deliciosa e incomparable gastronomía, que halaga gratamente al paladar más exigente; claro esto lo podrá  disfrutar viajando por La Ruta del Encanto, el corazón de la ciudad, sitio ideal para quienes gustan de la práctica del turismo rural, que es  una aventura pura  por el contacto natural, con su clima cálido seco.
Aquí vive la señora Leonila, tiene 60 años, es casada, su esposo es comerciante, de este matrimonio tiene 7 hijos, 6 mayores de edad y  una hija de 10 años que estudia en la escuela,  su casa que es propia. 
Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa (camisas, camisetas, jeans, etc.) su negocio lo sostiene con la ayuda de su esposo desde hace dos años. 
La señora Leonila  invertirá este crédito en comprar mercadería  (camisetas, jeans, blusas, ropa de dormir, etc.) para ampliar su stock. Los créditos los realiza desde hace 3 años,  le gusta la facilidad y agilidad para dar los créditos.
texts.en:
Portoviejo offers national and international tourists a great variety of delicious an incomparable cuisines, which please even the most demanding taste buds. These can be enjoyed traveling through La Ruta del Encanto, which is the heart of the city. This is an ideal place for those who like rural tourism because it is a pure adventure as a result of its contact with nature and its warm, dry climate.

In this place lives Leonila who is 60 years old and married. Her husband is a merchant. From this marriage, she has 7 children, 6 adults and a 10-year-old daughter who is in school. Leonila has her own home.

She makes a living selling clothing (shirts, blouses, jeans, etc.). For the past 2 years, she has maintained this business with the help of her husband. She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise (shirts, jeans, blouses, pajamas, etc.) in order to increase her stock. She has been receiving loans for the past 3 years; she likes the ease and speed with which the loans are granted.

loans.use: to buy shirts, jeans, blouses, pajamas, etc.

loans.name: Sanoat

texts.ru:
Саноат трудолюбивая женщина 46 лет. Она замужем и имеет четверых детей. Она живет в небольшом поселке.  Она  домохозяйка, но занимается животноводством. 
Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Саноат вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Шоира выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Сноат получает хороший доход.  И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Саноат  с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Саноат заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Sanoat is a hardworking 46-year-old woman. She is married with four children, and lives in a small village. Sanoat is a housewife, but also raises livestock. 

In order to have a steady income to pay for food, Sanoat and her husband started their own business raising livestock. They raise the cattle, and then sell the meat and milk. The business provides a good income, so they have enough to cover their basic needs. 

Now she and husband would like to buy more heads of cattle to fatten, so she wants to take a loan from Arvand. She thanks Arvand in advance for the support, which will enable them to improve their family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Nencia Del Carmen

texts.es:
