He is applying for this loan in order to buy melanin. Juan Carlos is happy with this loan and promises to make his repayments.

loans.use: to buy melanin.

loans.name: Ra'no

texts.ru:
Раъно жительница района Б.Гафурова города Худжанд. Она продолжает древнее ремесло таджиков, а именно пошив национального мужского одеяния "джома", который по сей день мужчины нашей страны одевают по случаю национальных мероприятий или данную одежду одевают мужчины старого возраста. 
Раъно сейчас 25 лет. Она замужем за таксиста, и в настоящее время она беременна и ждет пополнения семьи. Несмотря на свое положение Раъно продолжает свою деятельность и чтобы закупить ткани и материалы для изготовления заказа, она нуждается в кредите. И с такой целью она обратилась за кредитом. Поддержите Раъно в продолжении ее любимой работы.
texts.en: Ra'no is a resident of the B. Gafurov district of the town of Khujand. She continues a traditional Tajik craft of sewing men's national clothing, called "joma", which is still worn by men in our country during national events, or still worn by old men. Ra'no is now 25 years old. She is married to a taxi driver and is currently pregnant and awaiting an addition to the family. Despite her condition, Ra'no continues her business and needs a loan to buy fabrics and materials for completing an order. She requested a loan to achieve this goal. Please support Ra'no in continuing her beloved work.

loans.use: to buy fabrics and materials for sewing men's national clothing

loans.name: Tanzania Group

texts.en:
Salum, who is in his early 30s, is married with three children. Two are still small and one is in school. He has been running a general store for fifteen years now. He works from 8am to 10pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Salum's 18th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to increase the general store inventory and now the store is big and can meet his customers' demand. He has paid back all his loans successfully. He is happy with the loan and appreciates Kiva for the support of their group. He used the profit to pay school fees, build his house and cover household expenses. He will use this loan to replenish the general store inventory. He dreams of building another house.

Salum will share this loan with his loan group "Tanzania" which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to replenish the general store inventory.

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es:
La socia Emiliana pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO, la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de productos de primera necesidad, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio, la socia continua vendiendo arroz, azúcar entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para así continuar apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar entre otros.
texts.en:
The member Emiliana belongs to the communal bank NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO.  She continues to make a living selling staple goods, and feels grateful for the loan offered, promising to make her repayments on time. She has been in business for quite some time and continues selling rice, sugar, etc.  

Emiliana wants to continue working so she can support her family.  The loan she is requesting is to buy sugar and other goods.

loans.use: To buy sugar.and other goods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a modern sewing machine for her work.

loans.name: Songkhone Group

texts.en: Suan's village takes water from wells and from the local streams.  Some people in the village, including Suan, are able to buy bottled water.  The water from natural sources in this area is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment.  The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Suan is excited that she, like her group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. The water filter also increases disposable income to users like Suan due to the decreased cost of purchasing charcoal, by decreasing time spent foraging for wood, and decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years, though most find the filter works from 3-5 years.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Zenobia

texts.es:
La socia Zenobia  pertenece al banco comunal NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO, la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de  venta de comida, la socia Zenobia se siente agradecida con el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido, la socia continua elaborando diversos platos para su clientes que le solicitan como arroz con pollo,saltados,sopas entre otros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite entre otros.
texts.en:
The member Zenobia belongs to the communal bank NUEVO AMANECER DEL CUSCO.  She remains committed to the business of selling food and is grateful for the loan granted and promises to make the repayments in the agreed timescale.  

Zenobia continues to make different dishes for her customers who request chicken with rice, sautees, soups and other dishes.  She is a responsible, hard-working person who wants to continue in order to carry on supporting her family in this way. 

Zenobia is asking for the loan to buy rice, oil and other goods.

loans.use: To buy rice, oil and other goods.

loans.name: Maria Antonieta

texts.es:
La socia Maria se sigue dedicando al trabajo en una joyeria,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salr adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener un atienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar un televisor para su casa.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maria continues to work at a jewelry store, earning enough to get ahead.  Her dream is to open a grocery store.  The loan she is requesting is to buy a television set for her home.

The member is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy a television set for her home.

loans.name: Ivan Leonel

texts.es:
Ivan, de 34 años de edad, estudió hasta sexto grado, está divorciado y tiene 3 hijos que viven con él.

Iván, se dedica a la albañilería, profesión que empezó a los 14 años de edad, cuando inició como ayudante, luego de 2 años ya era albañil y empezó a ganar más dinero.- Hizo dos viajes a Estados Unidos, pero su estadía solo fue por dos meses; cuando regresó, decidió dedicarse a la albañilería y actualmente trabaja por contratos.

El préstamo solicitado es para pagar la mano de obra para cosechar el maíz que tiene sembrado y comprar cerdos, para engordarlos y luego venderlos.

Ivan, sueña con que sus hijos crezcan con buena educación y trabajo para que lleguen a ser personas de bien y respetables en la sociedad y puedan gozar de una excelente calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ivan is 34 years old. He went to school through to sixth grade. He is divorced and has 3 children who live with him. 

Iván, is a bricklayer, a profession that he started doing at the age of 14. He first started as an assistant but after two years he became a bricklayer and started to earn more money. He has made two trips to the United States but he only stayed for two months. When he returned home, he decided to make a living from bricklaying and now he works under contract.   

The requested loan is to pay for workers to harvest the corn he has planted and to purchase pigs that he will fatten up and latter sell.

Ivan, dreams that his children grow up with a good education and that they obtain good jobs so that they become good, respectable people that have a good quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for workers to harvest the corn he has planted and to purchase pigs that he will fatten up and latter sell.

loans.name: Somsawad Group

texts.en: Somchid is excited that she, like her group members, was able to purchase a water filter. The silver nitrate-infused ceramic element removes and destroys bacteria and similar agents of water borne diseases. Somchid's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams; however, the water from natural sources in her village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment.  Even though some people in the village, including Somchid’s, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. Somchid and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water by purchasing less charcoal and decreasing the time spent foraging for firewood. Somchid's filter is guaranteed for 2 years, though most users find the filter works from 3-5 years. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; increasing time available for productive work also improves a family’s income and over all well-being.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Carlos Ulises

texts.es:
Carlos, con la ayuda del préstamo anterior mantiene su taller de pintura y enderezado de vehículos, sus nuevas ganancias le dan oportunidad de ir cancelando sus deudas, ha implementado un nuevo negocio de ofrecer el servicio de taxi y tiene una persona que se lo atiende, mientras él se encarga del taller. Su familia vive en mejores condiciones de vida y están a la espera de un bebe que pronto nacerá.
En esta oportunidad solicita un nuevo crédito para comprar un motor y otros repuestos para el taxi, de esta manera ofrecerá a sus clientes un buen servicio y seguirá recibiendo mejores ingresos, espera a futuro poder comprar otro taxi.
texts.en:
Carlos has used the previous loan to help maintain his auto paint and body shop.  His earnings have allowed him to pay off debt, and he has a new taxi service, with a person who drives it while he takes care of the shop.

His family enjoys better living conditions and they are expecting a new baby soon.

This time Carlos is requesting a new loan to buy an engine and spare parts for the taxi.  This is so he can offer better customer service and continue to improve his income.  In the future he wants to buy another taxi.

loans.use: To buy an engine and other spare parts for his taxi so he can offer better service and earn more income.

loans.name: Nakham Group

texts.en: Lien's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams; however, the water from natural sources in Lien's village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Lien is excited that she, like her group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. Even though some people in the village, including Lien are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. Lien and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water by purchasing less charcoal or wood and decreasing the time spent foraging for firewood. Lien's filter is guaranteed for 2 years, though most users find the filter works from 3-5 years.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Deysi Aracely

texts.es:
Deysi, ha mejorado su negocio con la inversión del préstamo anterior, está notando que sus clientes han aumentado, los ingresos son cada vez más estables y puede dar a su familia un nivel de vida mejor.
Está solicitando capital para comprar maíz, harina, leña, cal y animales de corral, suplirá las demandas de sus clientes, elaborara la venta de panqueques y tortillas, además continuara trabajando para subsistir junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Deysi has improved her business with the previous loan.  She has noticed that her customers have increased and her income is increasingly more stable so she can give her family a better lifestyle.

The loan she is requesting is to buy corn, flour, firewood and small animals to meet customer demand.  She will make and sell pancakes and tortillas, and continue working to support her family.

loans.use: To buy corn, flour, firewood, lime and small animals to meet customer demand.

loans.name: Naaoynu Group

texts.en: Seangkeo's village takes water from wells and from the local streams. Some people in the village, including Seangkeo, are able to buy bottled water.  The water from natural sources in this area is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Seangkeo is excited that she, like her group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. The water filter also increases disposable income to users like Seangkeo due to the decreased cost of purchasing charcoal, by decreasing time spent foraging for wood, and decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. The filter is guaranteed for 2 years, though most find the filter works from 3-5 years.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Phondu Group

texts.en: Bounlak's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams; however, the water from natural sources in Bounlak's village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Bounlak is excited that he, like his group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. Even though some people in the village, including Bounlak, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. Bounlak and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water by purchasing less charcoal or wood and decreasing the time spent foraging for firewood. Bounlak's filter is guaranteed for 2 years, though most users find the filter works from 3-5 years.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more sheep for his barn

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 22 years old. He lives in Gaza with his family. He sells various kinds of foodstuffs such as cookies, candies, soft drinks, juices, macaroni, and many other items in his grocery store. He opened it two years ago.

Mohammad and his family are one of the affected families from the last war in Gaza, so he applied for this loan to rebuild the damaged walls and ceiling, paint the house and install electricity, doors and windows, which will help him to improve the living conditions for his family.

Mohammad is very grateful to everyone who helps him and helps to save his family.

loans.use: to rebuild the damaged walls and ceiling, paint the house and install electricity, doors and windows.

loans.name: Dolores Maria

texts.es:
En el cantón 24 De Mayo de la  provincia de Manabí, conocido por sus paisajes hermosos, por sus bosques, variedad de fauna y por su gente amable y  trabajadora dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería, se reúne cada quince días el Grupo de Crédito Madre Para Un Futuro Mejor. 
En este lugar vive la señora Dolores,  tiene 59 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene  cuatro hijos pero uno falleció, los tres que aun tiene son  mayores de edad,  uno  de ellos aun viven con ellos. Su esposo  comerciante.
Doña Dolores es una mujer que le gusta ganar lo suyo y así no depender de su marido sino mas bien ayudarlo con los gastos que genera el hogar, para esto ella se dedica al comercio, vende ropa de todo tipo, sabanas, toldos, toallas,  semijoyas, entre otras cosas, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta, sale dos o tres veces por semana a ofrecer sus productos y  también vende en la casa, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Lleva más de 13 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, sabanas, toldos, toallas, entre otras cosas. Es socia fundadora del Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque siempre le han ayudado con los créditos. Sus sueños son seguir adelante con su negocio
texts.en:
The “Madre Para Un Futuro Mejor” communal bank meets every two weeks in the “24 de Mayo” settlement, located in the Manabí province, known for its beautiful landscape, its forests, variety of fauna, and for its friendly, hardworking people dedicated to farming and livestock.

Dolores lives here. She’s 59 years old, married, and had four minor children but one of them died. The three that she has are all adults and only one of them lives with her. Her husband is a merchant. 

Dolores is a woman that likes to earn her own income and not depend on her husband but rather help him with the household expenses. For this reason, she works selling all types of clothing, sheets, hoods, towels and costume jewellery amongst other things. Twice or three times a week she goes out to sell door to door and she also sells from her home. She sells on credit and collects every eight days. She has been doing this for more than 13 years.   

This loan is to purchase clothes, sheets, hoods and towels amongst other things. She is a founding member of the loan group and likes it because it has always helped her with her loans. Her dream is to move her business forward.

loans.use: to purchase clothes, sheets, hoods, towels etc.

loans.name: Danira Del Carmen

texts.es: Danira de 41 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de celulares, DVD, antenas, repuestos para electrodomésticos, etc. desde hace 12 años su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas productos por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Danira, 41, lives in her own home with her life partner and three children. She works selling mobile phones, DVDs, antennae, spare parts for appliances etc. For more than 12 years her business has been located in her place of residence and she has many clients. 

She is asking for a loan in order to buy more products in bulk so that she can continue her sales and so increase her income.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones, DVDs, antennae, spare parts for appliances etc.

loans.name: Glenda Armida

texts.es:
Glenda, por medio de préstamos está manteniendo la venta de antojitos en el mercado, tiene más clientes satisfechos, puede ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar y ha cancelado su deuda.
Nuevamente pide ayuda a través de un crédito para poder comprar papas, plátanos, aceite, yuca, etc., elaborara fácilmente la venta de empanadas, tostadas, enchiladas, etc., para mantener su negocio con vida.
texts.en:
Glenda has been able to continue selling snacks in the city market, better satisfy her customers’ demands, help her husband with the home expenses and pay off her debt, thanks to these loans.

She is requesting help again through a loan to buy potatoes, plantains, vegetable oil, cassava, etc. She will be able to sell empanadas, tostadas, enchiladas, etc. and keep her business running.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, plantains, oil, cassava, etc. to prepare food to sell.

loans.name: Maria Anita

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo crédito para comprar aceite, azúcar, maíz, frijol, huevos, jabón, etc., engrandecerá y fortalecerá su tienda de productos de primera necesidad.
El efecto del préstamo anterior en su negocio ha sido positivo ya que  se ha mantenido trabajando, logra cubrir las necesidades de sus clientes y su situación económica es un poco favorable, su familia vive en un mejor ambiente, uno de sus hijos se encuentra en recuperación de una pierna por haber sufrido de parálisis.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan to buy vegetable oil, sugar, corn, beans, eggs, soap, etc. Her store will grow and her business will improve.

The previous loan had a positive effect on her business. She could keep it running, satisfy her customers’ needs and improve her financial situation. Her family is now living more comfortably and one of her children is recovering from temporary paralysis that affected his/her leg [gender unspecified].

loans.use: to buy oil, sugar, corn, beans, eggs, soap, etc. for her store.

loans.name: Alla Soutoura Group

texts.fr: Salimata vend des œufs et de l'eau glacé depuis 20 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 4 enfants tous scolarisés. Elle est le membre représentatif de ce groupe de femmes qui exercent dans le domaine alimentaire et qui honorent toujours leur engagement vis à vis de ACFIME. Avec ce prêt, Salimata voudrait acheter plus d’œufs, des plaquettes pour les conditionner et vendre. En plus de cela, elle voudrait faire la glace pour vendre. A l'issue de ses ventes, elle pourrait régler ses dépenses de fonctionnement et faire un bénéfice qui lui permettra d'épargner et de s'occuper de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Salimata has been selling eggs and iced water for 20 years. She is married and the mother of four children, who are all in school.

Salimata is the representative for the group, which is made up of women running food businesses. They all honour their commitments to ACFIME.

With this loan, Salimata would like to buy more eggs, along with boxes in which to package and sell them. She would also like to make ice to sell.

The income from her sales will enable her to meet her running expenses, build up savings and look after her children.

loans.use: to buy eggs and make ice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in used PlayStation 3's, glasses, controls, cables, etc., to repair consoles and sell them at a better price. He hopes to make his business grow more.

loans.name: Jose Marcial

texts.es:
José, requiere de un nuevo préstamo para comprar una ternera, vitaminas para el ganado y también pagara el picado del zacate para alimentar mejor a su ganado, esta inversión le permite seguir mejorando.
Con el financiamiento anterior incremento los animales de corral, las da mejores cuidados, sus ganancias con mayores y tiene clientes satisfechos. Su núcleo familiar es el mismo.
texts.en:
José needs a new loan to buy a heifer, vitamins for cattle, and to pay to harvest grass to better feed his cattle. This investment allows him to keep improving. 

With the previous loan, he increased the amount of animals he has, he has more income, and satisfied customers. His nuclear family is the same.

loans.use: to buy a heifer, vitamins for cattle, and also to pay to harvest grass to better feed his cattle.

loans.name: Concepcion Del Rosario

texts.es:
Concepción, tiene 28 años de edad, vive con su esposo de 32 años de edad y dos hijos de 9 y 8 años de edad; su negocio consiste compra y venta de ropa para caballero, dama y niño/a, ya cuenta con 4 años de dedicarse a dicha actividad, trabaja a tiempo completo en su negocio.
Utilizará el capital para comprar variedad de prendas de vestir para caballeros, damas y niños/as, le será de ayuda para renovar su inventario y atraer a nuevos clientes, espera que su negocio sea más competitivo, le genere mayores ganancias con las cuales cumplirá con sus diferentes compromisos.
Sus proyectos son tener un bazar en el que oferte diferentes productos, tener un local propio y brindar a sus hijos una buena educación para que en el futuro sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Concepción is 28 years old. She lives with her husband who is 32, and two children, ages 9 and 8. She buys and sells clothes for men, women and children. She has been doing this for four years and works full time.

She will use the loan to buy different clothes for men, women and children. She will renew her inventory and attract new customers. She hopes to have a more competitive business that can generate more profits and help her to fulfill her obligations.

Her goal is to have her own establishment where she can sell different products, and pay for her children’s education so that they can become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy different clothes for men, women, and children.

loans.name: Siid Waya Tanghin Group

texts.fr:
Monsieur POUSGA est le représentant du groupe SIID WAYA TANGHIN. Marié, il est  père de 07enfants. Le plus âgé à 21 ans et le moins âgé a 02 ans. 03 vont à l’école. Il a 22personnes en charge.
Monsieur est éleveur depuis 30 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés de environnants. 
Il veut s’acheter  03 moutons ;10 poules.
Monsieur veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour agrandir son activité. Il ambitionne être un grand éleveur et en même temps grossiste.
texts.en:
Pousga is the representative of the Siid Waya Tanghin Group. He is married and has seven children, the eldest of whom is 21 and the youngest two. Three of his children are in school, and he has 22 people to support.

Pousga has been a farmer for 30 years. He buys supplies from the local markets and would like to buy three sheep and ten chickens.

Pousga will use his revenue to expand his business. He would like to become a large-scale farmer and wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy three sheep and ten chickens.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
La socia Maribel se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de frutas , por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante, la socia es una mujer emprendedora, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de frutas. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar manzanas, naranjas, platanos y mandarinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Maribel keeps working in the fruit selling business. Through this business she wants to get ahead. She is an enterprising woman. Her dream is to expand the fruit selling business. She is asking for the loan to buy apples, oranges, plantains and tangerines.

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy apples, oranges, plantains and tangerines.

loans.name: Nangua Group

texts.en:
No is excited that she, like her group members, was able to purchase a water filter. The silver nitrate infused, ceramic element removes and destroys bacteria and similar agents of water borne diseases. 

No's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams.  However, the water from natural sources in her village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment.  Even though some people in the village, including No’s, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. 

No and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water by purchasing less charcoal and decreasing the time spent foraging for firewood. No's filter is guaranteed for two years, though most users find the filter works from three to five years. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter.  Increasing time available for productive work also improves a family’s income and over all well-being.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase his capital and buy a lot of wooden planks and glue, to make chairs that he will sell to make more income.

loans.name: Naniyom Group

texts.en:
Nang's village takes water from wells and from the local streams.  Some people in the village, including Nang’s, are able to buy bottled water.  The water from natural sources in this area is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment.  The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water.    

Nang is excited that she, like her group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter.  This is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. The water filter also increases disposable income to users like Nang due to the decreased cost of purchasing charcoal, the decreased time spent foraging for wood, and the decreased amount of money used to  purchase bottled water. The filter is guaranteed for two years, though most find the filter works from three to five years.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Wend-Manegda Koanga Bingo Group

texts.fr:
Monsieur GUETAWINDE JEAN est le représentant du groupe WEND-MANEGDA KOANGA BINGO. Marié, il est  père de 02enfants. Le plus âgé à 06 ans et le moins âgé a 02 ans. 01vont à l’école. Il a 03personnes en charge.
Monsieur est éleveur depuis 06 ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés de environnants. 
Il veut s’acheter  02 abreuvoirs ;03 mangeoires; 12 poules.
Monsieur veut utiliser ses bénéfices pour agrandir son activité et nourrir sa famille. Il ambitionne pouvoir scolariser ses enfants.
texts.en:
Guetawinde Jean is the representative of the Wend-Manegda Koanga Bingo Group. He is married and the father of two children. His eldest child is six and the youngest two, and one of them is in school. Guetawinde Jean has three people to support.

Guetawinde Jean has been a farmer for six years. He buys his supplies at the local markets. He would like to buy two water troughs, three feed troughs and 12 chickens.

Guetawinde Jean would like to use his income to expand his business and feed his family. He hopes to be able to put his children through school.

loans.use: to buy two water troughs, three feed troughs and 12 chickens.

loans.name: Thorknayor Group

texts.en:
Buachan's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams.  However, the water from natural sources in Buachan's village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. 

Buachan is excited that she, like her group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter.  This is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. 

Even though some people in the village, including Buachan’s, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. Buachan and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water by purchasing less charcoal or wood and decreasing the time spent foraging for firewood. Buachan's filter is guaranteed for two years, though most users find that the filter works from three to five years.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Bualee

texts.en:
Bualee's village takes water from wells and from the local streams.  Some people in the village, including Bualee’s, are able to buy bottled water.  The water from natural sources in this area is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment.  The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water.    

Bualee is excited that she was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter.  This is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. The water filter also increases disposable income to users like Bualee due to the decreased cost of purchasing charcoal, the decreased time spent foraging for wood, and the decreased amount of money used to  purchase bottled water. 

The filter is guaranteed for two years, though most find the filter works from three to five years.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter so she can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Gpt Coméva De Marché Mame Diarra  Sant Yalla Group

texts.fr:
Le groupement Coméva Marché Mame Diarra sant yalla est un regroupement de vendeuses qui sont dans le même marché, c’est d’ailleurs dans ces conditions qu’ils se sont unis pour bénéficier d’un crédit à l’IMCEC. Le responsable s’appelle Alla, il s’active dans le commerce et l’aviculture et a une expérience de 21 ans. Il sollicite ce crédit pour acheter des céréales locales telles que du mil, de l’arachide et des haricots pour revendre. Il est actif toute la journée de 9h à 20h.
Alla est marié et père de 5 enfants dont le plus âgé a 30 ans et le cadet, 3 ans. Grâce aux revenus, il s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne et de la location.
Il désire développer son activité de ventes de céréales, avoir sa propre maison et y construire un magasin pour y déménager l’activité.
texts.en:
The Coméva Market Mame Diarra Sant Yalla group is composed of saleswomen who work at the same market. Indeed that is where they made up the group in order to qualify for the IMCEC loan. The leader is called Alla, he works as a salesman and in poultry farming and has 21 years experience. He requests this loan to buy local cereals such as millet,  groundnuts and beans for resale. He works all day from 0900 to 2000.
Alla is married with five children of whom the oldest is 30 and the youngest three. His income enables him to provide for the family's daily expenses and rent.
He would like to expand his cereal commerce, have his own house, and build a shop in it to relocate his business.

loans.use: to buy local cereals such as millet and groundnuts and beans for resale.

loans.name: Pailino

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de cortar arboles y tambien al trabajo como maestro de construccion de casas y tambien el socio se dedica al negocio de agricultura,el sueño del socio es ampliar su negocio de cortar arboles y por medio de estos negocios quiere salir adelante.El socio solicita el credito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Pailino continues working in the business of cutting trees, building homes and farming. His dream is to grow his business of cutting trees, and through these businesses he wants to move ahead. He is requesting the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. He is grateful for the loan and promises to make the established payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Douey Group

texts.en:
Nang is excited that she, like her group members, was able to purchase a water filter. The silver nitrate-infused ceramic element removes and destroys bacteria and similar agents of water borne diseases. 

Nang's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams.  However, the water from natural sources in her village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment.  Even though some people in the village, including Nang’s, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. Nang and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water by purchasing less charcoal and decreasing the time spent foraging for firewood. 

Nang's filter is guaranteed for two years, though most users find the filter works from three to five years. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filte.  Increasing time available for productive work also improves a family’s income and over all well-being.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so they can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Mariluz

texts.es:
La socia Mariluz se sigue dedicando al negocio de cafetin,la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener otro cafetin nuevo.La socia solicita el credito para comprar tortas,pasteles y gelatinas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mariluz continues to dedicate herself to her cafe.  She is a hardworking and enterprising woman who wants to get her children ahead through her business.  Her dream is to open another cafe.  

She is seeing a loan to purchase cakes, pastries and gelatins.  She is happy for the loan and she is committed to making the payments on time.

loans.use: purchase cakes, pastries and gelatin.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase his capital and purchase a large quantity of beer, to resell in order to earn more.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: increase his capital and buy many goats to sell a large quantity of meat in order to earn more.

loans.name: La Capillita Group

texts.es:
El asfalto que recientemente se ha convertido en la carretera principal ha facilitado el acceso a la comunidad donde se encuentra el grupo La Capillita. El nombre se debe a que en la casa donde se creó la asociación hay una pequeña capilla con algunas imágenes religiosas, los integrantes son: 

Noelia –Abarrotes y Ropa
Maria –Antojitos 
Maria Del Carmen –Ropa 
Jorge Alberto - Oro Laminado
Angel –Abarrotes y Mojarra
Ana -Plata
Rosa –Ropa Americana 
Heber –Calzado por catalogo
Leticia -Dulces

Don Ángel está casado con la señora Emma, con ellos vive una nieta la cual los quiere como padres. Anteriormente don Ángel se dedicaba a trabajar en el campo, además de haber cumplido el sueño americano, se encuentra nuevamente en su lugar de origen. Ahora cuenta con 2 años de experiencia en la venta de abarrotes, y recientemente inició a criar mojarras para lo cual construyó 4 estanques apoyado con las ganancias de la venta de abarrotes y los préstamos de VisionFund. Para él, esta nueva actividad, significa una oportunidad para tener mayores ganancias. 

Ahora, Don Ángel necesita apoyo para comprar más mercancía para la tienda como arroz, frijol, azúcar, café, aceite, maíz, galletas, refrescos, botanas, yogurt; así como para comprar alimento para las mojarras y dos bombas para oxigenar los estanques. Como buen comerciante, para don Ángel "el cliente es primero pues de ellos depende que los negocios continúen andando". 

Don Ángel agradece por la confianza que VisionFund ha depositado en el grupo para acceder a un nuevo préstamo.

*La fotografía fue tomada en la tienda de don Ángel quien viste camiseta gris y short negro.
texts.en:
The asphalt that has recently become the main road has facilitated access to the community where the group La Capillita is located. The group's name is from the house where the group was created. There is a small chapel (capilla) with some religious images. The members are:

Noelia - Groceries and clothes
Maria - Snacks
Maria Del Carmen - Clothing
Jorge Alberto - Laminated gold
Angel - Groceries and fish
Ana - Plata
Rosa - American clothing
Heber - Footwear by catalog
Leticia - Sweets

Ángel is married to Emma. A granddaughter lives with them and they act as her parents. Previously, Angel worked in the fields. After having completed the American Dream, he returned home. Now he has 2 years of experience in the sale of groceries and recently he began to raise fish for which he constructed 4 tanks with the income from the grocery sales and loans from VisionFund. For him, this new activity signifies an opportunity for him to have better income.

Now Ángel needs help to buy more merchandise for his store like rice, beans, coffee, oil, corn, cookies, drinks, snacks, yogurt; he also needs to buy food for the fish and two pumps to oxygenate the tanks. As a good merchant, for Ángel, "the customer comes first, as they depend upon them for the business to continue moving forward."

Ángel  is grateful for the confidence that VisionFund has placed on the group to begin a new loan.

The photo was taken in Ángel's store. Ángel is in a grey shirt and black shorts.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar, coffee, oil, corn, cookies, drinks, snacks, yogurt, food and two pumps to oxygenate the tanks.

loans.name: Janatu Comeva Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de crédit » Janatu Comeva » rassemble des femmes qui travaillent dans le même marché. Elles se sont regroupées pour bénéficier d’un appui financier dans le cadre d’une association. 
La présidente, madame Siga, est commerçante depuis plus de 15 ans. Elle tient sa cantine dans le marché où elle vend de l’huile de palme, des légumes, de l’oignon, des épices. Elle a déjà bénéficié d’un crédit et ce renouvellement va lui permettre d’améliorer son activité : acheter des condiments et de l’huile de palme et mettre dans sa cantine pour revendre. 
Siga est mariée et mère de 8 enfants dont son ainé âgé de 41 ans et la benjamine, de 22 ans. Elle a de grands enfants qui aident dans la gestion des dépenses, mais c’est elle qui prend en charge sa lingère, sa ménagère et le gaz. 
Le souci majeur de Siga est de mettre ses enfants dans de bonnes conditions de vie.
texts.en:
The Janatu Comeva group is made up of saleswomen who work at the same market. They joined together in a group in order to take advantage of financial support given to associations.
Mrs. Siga, the president has been a saleswoman for over 15 years. She runs the canteen at the market where she sells palm oil, vegetables, onions, and spices. She has already had a loan and this renewed credit will enable her to improve her business: to buy condiments and palm oil for her canteen for resale.
Siga is married with eight children of whom the oldest is 41 and the youngest 22 years old. She has grown up children who help her manage her expenses, but she is responsible for her own linen, her housekeeping and the gas.
Siga's main preoccupation is to set her children on their way in life good conditions.

loans.use: to buy food products for resale.

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es: Don Marvin nació en un lugar llamado san Ramón en el año de 1977. Marvin desde muy pequeño ayudaba a su padre a trabajar en labores de agricultura así fue que aprendió a trabajar la tierra y a sembrar granos básicos; que es su actual actividad económica; el siembra granos básicos para la venta y también para su propio consumo.  Marvin actualmente tiene 4 hijos, sus hijos mayores ya asisten a la escuela de la comunidad y además tambien le ayudan en el trabajo de las tierras. Don Marvin comenta que se ha esforzado bastante para construir su casa es humilde pero comenta que ya vive bajo techo él y su familia. En esta comunidad de San Juan no hay luz eléctrica es por eso que don Marvin solicita un préstamo para la compra de un sistema solar e instalarlo en la casa. Para Marvin y su familia este sistema solar será de gran beneficio, ya que sus hijos mayores están estudiando y ya se podrán iluminar y hacer las tareas por las noches, ya será diferente por las noches, ya no utilizarán candelas ni focos, disminuyendo el riesgo de exponerse a una quemadura o de incendiar la casa. Don Marvin dice que estaría muy agradecido si le brindan la oportunidad de este préstamo para la compra del sistema solar.
texts.en:
Marvin was born in San Ramón in 1977.  From a very young age, Marvin helped his father with his agricultural work, which is how he learned how to work the land and plant basic grains, which is now his current job.  He grows basic grains to sell as well as for his own consumption.  Marvin has four children, his older children attend a local school and also help him work the land.

Marvin states that he has worked very hard to build his home, which is humble, but it provides a roof for him and his family.  In the community of San Juan, there is no electricity, which is why Marvin is seeking a loan to purchase a solar power system and install it in his home.  This system would be extremely beneficial for Marvin and his family because his older children are in school and will now be able to have light so that they can do their homework at night.  They will no longer have to use candles and flashlights to do their homework, reducing the risk of burns of setting the house on fire.  

Marvin says that he would be very grateful for the loan to purchase the solar power system.

loans.use: purchase a solar power system.

loans.name: Maryteresa

texts.en:
Maryteresa is 52 years old. She is married to Eric, and together they have been blessed with five children, whose ages are between 36 and 28 years.

Maryteresa is a fruits vendor, which is a business she has done for the last five years, earning a monthly income of KES 11,500.  Maryteresa has requested for her second loan with VisionFund Kenya of KES 20,000, which she intends to use to buy wholesale fruits in season. These include mangoes, avocados and bananas. 

With the anticipated profits, Maryteresa will be able to expand her business further.  Her hope and dream for the future is to build herself a home.

loans.use: to buy fruits in season.

loans.name: Rakhila

texts.en:
Rakhila is a 44-year-old married woman, who lives with her husband, who is a private artisan. Rakhila works on family-owned agricultural land, harvests potatoes and cucumbers and sells them locally. 

In order to increase her turnover and financial condition, Rakhila wants to expand her assortment of trading products. She requested a loan from local financial institutions, and was approved within the joint initiative between Kiva and Credo.  The start up program allows rural poor people like Rakhila to get a chance to start or re-start a business.  With the requested amount, she will purchase various kinds of fruits and vegetables at wholesale prices and will sell them in the local market with price mark-ups. 

The loan will greatly assist Rakhila, and she will be able to continue her activity. Due to her kind and nice attitude toward clients, Rakhila has a big list of loyal customers. She will be very thankful for the support and kindness.

loans.use: to expand her trading business with fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy drinks for the grocery store.

loans.name: Los Tríos Group

texts.es: Al grupo solidario los Tríos lo integran tres microempresarias emprendedoras. Es coordinado por Erika una mujer laboriosa de 33 años de edad, casada, impulsó su propio negocio, un Cyber y librería ubicada en su domicilio, tiene cuatro años de experiencia y este crédito lo solicita para la compra de cartuchos de impresora y fotocopiadora, cartulina, fomy, cuadernos universitarios, escarches, con los financiamientos anteriores ha logrado ofrecer un servicio de calidad. Las otras integrantes son las señoras, Elisa de 37 años de edad, comerciante de calzado en el mercado de Jinotepe desde hace dos años, y Maira que tiene la edad de 40 años dedicada a la hecha y venta de tortilla y nacatamal desde hace siete años en su domicilio.
texts.en:
The solidarity group "Los Tríos" is made up of three enterprising women that have their own micro-businesses.

Erika is the group coordinator. She is a hardworking 33-year-old married woman. She set up her own business, an Internet cafe and a book store located in her house and has 4 years of experience.

She requests this loan to buy ink and toner cartridges, color cardboards, EVA foam, notebooks, glitter, etc. With the previous loans she managed to offer a quality service.

The other members of the group are Elisa and Maira. Elisa is 37 years old and has made a living selling shoes at Jinotepe market for 2 years. Maira is 40 years old, she works making and selling tortillas and nacatamales (pork-filled tamales) in her house and has been doing so for 7 years.

loans.use: to buy ink and toner cartridges, color cardboards, EVA foam, notebooks, etc. to offer a quality service.

loans.name: Gie And Diappo Group

texts.fr:
Le G.I.E And Diappo est une association de commerçants qui s’activent dans le marché depuis plusieurs années. Ils se sont regroupés pour bénéficier d’un appui financier.
Le responsable, monsieur Cheikh est mareyeur de profession et exerce ce métier depuis 5 ans maintenant. Il est marié et père de 4 enfants dont son ainé, une fille de 11 ans qui est au primaire. Avec ce crédit, Cheikh va renforcer les frais liés au voyage en mer pour aller chercher du poisson. Il possède une pirogue et emploie trois personnes avec qui il partage le bénéfice après la vente. Cheikh s’occupe de sa dépense et de l’éducation de ses enfants.
Il a envie d’ouvrir une cantine pour vendre des produits de pêche et diversifier ses sources de revenus.
texts.en:
The G.I.E And Diappo is an association of salesmen who have been working at the market for several years. They joined together in a group in order to take advantage of financial support .
The leader, Mr. Cheikh has been a wholesale sea-fish merchant for five years now. He is married with four children. His oldest daughter is 11 years old and in primary school. With his loan, Cheikh plans to cover the costs of the sea journeys that he makes looking for fish. He owns a dugout canoe and has three employees with whom he shares his profits after the fish is sold. Cheikh provides for the family expenses and his children's school fees.
He would like to open a canteen to sell his fish and diversify his source of income.

loans.use: to buy fish for resale.

loans.name: María Luisa

texts.es:
María, de 34 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos.- Ella es una persona honesta, responsable y trabajadora,  se crio junto a su madre, ayudando en los quehaceres del hogar y ayudándole en un pequeño negocio que tenía su mamá.- 

Actualmente María, junto a su esposo tiene una tienda de venta de granos básicos, de la cual obtiene ingresos que le ayudan para el sostenimiento de su familia.  

María, tiene alrededor de 6 años de manejar la tienda, lo cual le ha dado experiencia para poder administrarla y de esa forma que le genere ingresos para los gastos de su familia.  

El dinero del crédito lo necesita, para comprar azúcar, frijoles, pan, harina, etc. para surtir su tienda, ya que necesita poder tener más productos para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.

María, sueña con ampliar su tienda, para que le genere más ingresos y desea que sus hijos estudien y sean profesionales de éxito.
texts.en:
María, aged 34, is married and has two children, and is an honest, responsible and hardworking person. She grew up with her mother, helping out both with household chores and in the small store that her mother owned.

Currently, María and her husband have a store selling basic staple goods, through which she obtains an income that helps her to support her family.

María has run the store for around six years, which has given her the experience to be able to manage it. This way the store can generate income for her and her family's expenses.

She needs the money from this loan to buy sugar, beans, bread, flour, etc. to stock her store, as she needs more products in order to satisfy the needs of her customers.

María dreams of expanding her store so that it will generate a higher income, and wants her children to study and become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy sugar, beans, bread, flour, etc. to stock her store.

loans.name: Jannat

texts.en:
Jannat is a 27-years-old single woman from Khanyounis, Palestine. She finished her university studies and could not find a job. Jannat decided to help university students in their research and the analysis. This is a very good business and Jannat has good general information and she is very good in using data analysis programs.

Jannat took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new and modern laptop for her business. By taking this loan Jannat will be able to work faster and more efficiently.  

Jannat appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy a new and modern laptop for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more energy saving and environmentally friendly cook stoves

loans.name: Fe

texts.en:
Fe is 43 years of age and a resident of Usocan, Plaridel, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. She is married with four children. They have a little fishing business from which they earn a living.  With their business, they have many challenges, but they realized that it is good to face the challenges rather than get discouraged. 

Fe and her husband work hard in selling their catch to the market. Sometimes there are wholesale buyers from other towns and cities who come to buy their fish. With their savings, they welcome the idea of expanding their business.  

They have requested from Paglaum MPC a Php 15,000 loan to purchase new nets, foams, and other fishing accessories. They feel assured of Paglaum’s help, should there be a need for working capital in the future. Fe smiles at the thought of seeing their children get their own diplomas one day.

loans.use: to purchase new nets, foams, and other fishing accessories

loans.name: Felix

texts.en:
Felix runs a sari-sari (variety) store. He sells goods like candies, chips, snack foods, lollipops, and chocolates. He is a married man with two children ages 15 and 12 years old. He has been running a variety store for more than 10 years now. Together with his family he lives in Talibon, Bohol.

Felix has requested a loan to buy items like paper, ballpoint pens, bond papers, and other school supplies. These will fill his store with additional goods to offer to his respective customers. He could then start to improve his earnings and slowly gain profit.

In the future, he is hoping that he could expand his current source of income to support the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to buy items like paper, pens, bond papers, and other school supplies

loans.name: Digna Marivel

texts.es:
Digna, de 52 años de edad, está soltera, estudió hasta tercer grado, luego de que su madre falleciera, ella ya no pudo continuar estudiando, ya que tenía que trabajar para poder ayudar a pagar los gatos de la casa.- Actualmente, vive solo con su único hijo, que está acompañado pero vive junto a ella.

Digna, todos los días se levanta muy temprano, para preparar los alimentos que irá a vender a un cafetín que tiene en una escuela de su cantón, la distancia que camina es de 400 metros, ella vende tostadas de plátano, sodas, jugos, golosinas, entre otros productos más. Desde hace 11 años ella está vendiendo en ese lugar y aproximadamente gana $70 diarios.

Anteriormente, había solicitado un crédito para comprar un novillo, ahora Digna, necesita el crédito para comprar mesas, sillas y recipientes para colocar los alimentos que tiene a la venta en su cafetín.

El anhelo de Digna es, mejorar su negocio y ampliarlo más, ya que si eso pasa tendrá mayores posibilidades de ganar un poco más y arreglar su vivienda como siempre lo ha soñado.
texts.en:
Digna, 52 years old, is single, went to school up to the third grade, and after her mother died, she couldn't continue going to school since she had to work to help pay the household expenses. Currently, she lives just with her only son, who is partnered but lives with her. 

Digna get up every day very early to prepare the food that will be sold in a small cafe that she has in a school in her canton; she walks a distance of 400 meters to get there. She sells plantain tostadas, sodas, juices, and candies among other products. For the last 11 years, she has been selling in this place and earns approximately $70 each day. 

Previously, she had asked for a loan to purchase a heifer. Now Digna needs the loan to purchase tables, chairs and containers to hold her food that she has for sale at her small cafe. 

Digna's desire is to improve her business and expand it more, since if this happens, she will have better possibilities of earning a bit more and to fix up her house as she has always dreamed of doing.

loans.use: to purchase tables, chairs, and containers to place the foods that she has for sale at her cafe.

loans.name: Arnold

texts.es: Arnold tiene 41 años, es casado tiene 4 hijos, vive en EL ALTO en una casa de ladrillo y cemento que es de su propiedad y cuenta con todos los servicios basicos, Arnold quiere construir un taller  en su casa para poder incrementar su produccion e incluso contratar un operario Arnold sigue dedica a la costura sacos, chalecos y pantalones,  es la unica fuente de ingresos en su hogar, por lo que necesita credito y espera que puedan darselo
texts.en: Arnold is 41 years old, married, and has 4 children. He lives in El Alto in a brick and cement house that is his property and has all the basic services.  Arnold wants to build a workshop in his house to be able to increase his production and even to hire a worker. Arnold continues working making jackets, vests, and pants, and it is the only source of income in his household, so he needs a loan and hopes that you can give it to him.

loans.use: to build a workshop.

loans.name: Sameer

texts.en:
Sameer is a 26-years-old single man from Dora, a village near Hebron City. He worked in a private medical clinic as an employee after finishing his studies as a general doctor. Sameer would like to start his own business and be independent.

He rented a new office to start working in it. Sameer took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy new furniture and some tools he needs for his new clinic. By taking this loan, Sameer will be able to open his own business and be independent.

Sameer appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy new furniture and some tools he needs for his new clinic.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase cement and sand to renovate the house on the inside.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dowry for her nephew's wedding.

loans.name: Khetam

texts.en:
Khetam is a 30-years-old married woman from Qalqilia. She is a mother of three sons. Her husband works in selling fresh fruits and vegetables in the city. He buys produce from the local farmers. It is a good business but the income is not enough to cover all the family needs. 

Khetam took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her husband to buy more produce for his fruits and vegetables stall to resell. By taking this loan, the family income will be increased

Khetam appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy more produce for her husband's fruits and vegetables stall to resell.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: Sofia tiene 35 años, tiene 5 hijos, uno de ellos es sordo mudo y se llama Jose Luis y tiene 15 años. Recientemente Sofia dio a luz y por eso no esta trabajando, ella era ayudante de albañil, en cuanto a su marido, este es taxista y trabaja desde las 6 de la mañana hasta las 11 de la noche, esto desde3 hace 5 años Sofia vive en casa propia en un acabado de ladrillo y piso de cemento en la ciudad de La Paz. Sofia necesita el crédito para la compra de material de construccion, comprara cemento, escuco y otros y de esta manera mejorar sucalidad de vida pues quiere seguir haciendo mejoras en su hogar En la foto Sofia aparece con su esposo y su ultimo hijo
texts.en: Sofia is 35 years old, has 5 children, one of them who is deaf and is named Jose Luis and is 15 years old. Recently Sofia gave birth and for this reason, she isn't working. She was a construction assistant. As for her husband, he is a taxi driver and has worked from 6 in the morning until 11 at night for the past 5 years. Sofia lives in her own house that is finished in brick and has a cement floor in the city of La Paz. Sofia needs the loan to purchase construction material. She will buy cement, stucco, and others and in this way will improve her quality of life since she wants to continue making improvements to her home. In the photo, Sofia is standing with her husband and their last child.

loans.use: to purchase cement, stucco and other materials.

loans.name: Norge Antonio

texts.es:
Norge, de 42 años de edad, es una persona honesta y trabajadora, ya que desde muy pequeño le enseñaron a trabajar, ahora está acompañado y tiene dos hijos. 

Norge, tiene 12 años de trabajar en la agricultura y la ganadería, fue su padre quien le enseño este oficio.- Hoy en día es de este trabajo que obtiene los ingresos para el bienestar de su familia.   

El Crédito lo necesita para comprar tres novillas de repasto, para alimentarlas y engordarlas para poder venderlas y que le generen ingresos, ya que debido a la enfermedad de su esposa, tuvo que vender tres de sus vacas para poder comprar los medicamentos y pagar el tratamiento de esa enfermedad.   

Norge, sueña con tener 8 vacas y también cultivar 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz  y de esa manera obtener más ingresos, para poder ayudarles a sus hijas a que puedan a estudiar, para que sean personas de bien.
texts.en:
Norge, 42 years old, is an honest and hard-working person who, since he was very young, was taught to work and now is partnered and has two children.

Norge has been working for 12 years in agriculture and animal husbandry; his father was the one who taught him this work. These days, it is from this work that he gets his income for his family's well-being.

The loan that he needs is to purchase three heifers, to feed them and fatten them to be able to sell them, and that will generate income for him, since due to his wife's illness, he had to sell three of his cows to be able to purchase the medicines and pay for the treatment for this illness.

Norge dreams of having 8 cows and also cultivating 14,000 square meters of corn, and in this way getting more income, to be able to help his daughters so that they can go to school and be good people.

loans.use: to purchase three heifers to fatten.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana tiene 51 años y se dedica a la elaboracion de deportivos, poleras y chaquetas diseñadas para ser ligeras y para permitir que el sudor se evapore rápidamente de la piel durante el ejercicio. La ropa deportiva con funciones de refrigeración puede estar hecha de fibras sintéticas, tales como el polipropileno, o fibras naturales como la lana. El diseño de la ropa, incluyendo el ajuste, el tejido y el color, también influyen en la capacidad del material para mantenerse fresco durante los entrenamientos. Juana trabaja desde las 8:30 hasta las 19:00 pm 

Ella vive en la ciudad de La Paz. Necesita credito para comprar otra  maquina de cocer
texts.en:
Juana is 51 years old and works making athletic clothing, shirts, and jackets designed to be light and allow the sweat to evaporate quickly from the skin during exercise. Athletic clothing with cooling properties can be made from synthetic fibers, such as polypropylene or natural fibers such as wool. The design of the clothing including the fit, the weave, and color, also influences the capacity of the material to remain fresh during practices. Juana works from 8:30 to 7:00 pm. 

She lives in the city of La Paz. She needs a loan to purchase another sewing machine.

loans.use: to purchase another sewing machine.

loans.name: Daisy

texts.en:
Daisy has a shop selling phone accessories in Nakuru, and has been running this business for three years now. She used her previous loan from VisionFund Kenya to buy phone accessories such as phone batteries, earphones and phone covers to sell. It was profitable, and she was able to repay the loan well.

She will use this loan to buy more stock of mobile phone accessories as well as drinking water and juice to sell. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business. 

This is her fourth loan term from VisionFund Kenya, and she paid her previous loans successfully. In the future, she hopes to open a wholesale shop and be successful.

loans.use: to buy more stock of phone accessories, drinking water and juice to sell.

loans.name: Harron

texts.en:
Harron is 47 years. He is married to Jepkosgei and together they have been blessed with 8 children with ages between 18 and 1 year old respectively.

Harron sells energy saving cook stoves, a business he has done for the last 1 year, earning a monthly income of 10,000 KES. Harron has requested his 1st loan with VisionFund Kenya of 15,000 KES, which he intends to use to purchase more energy saving and environmentally friendly cook stoves.

With the anticipated profits, Harron will be able to pay school fees for his children.  His hopes and dreams for the future are to continually expand his sales of the stoves as he makes profits.

loans.use: to purchase more energy saving and environmentally friendly cook stoves

loans.name: Zamoyo

texts.en:
Zamoyo, who is in her early 30s is single with three children two of whom are in school and one still small. She has been a food vendor for three years now.

This will be Zamoyo's first loan from Tujijenge, Tanzania.  She will use this loan to increase food stock and buy up to date cosmetics to resell.  She dreams of buying a plot to build a house.

Zamoyo will make sure she pays back the loan according to the scheduled time.

loans.use: to increase food stock and buy up to date cosmetics to resell

loans.name: Sana

texts.en:
Sana is a 25-year-old single woman, living with her parents in a poor area in Taiz, Yemen. She is an employee in the private sector with a small salary which is not enough to cover the necessary needs of the family. 

Sana's house lacks of a washing machine. That makes her feel very inconvenienced, and she can't afford this condition. When she washes clothes by hand, she feels tired.  For this reason, she decided to buy a washing machine for the house. Unfortunately, she doesn't have enough money to do. For this reason, she applied for a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase a washing machine for the house.

loans.use: to purchase a washing machine for the house.

loans.name: Dilshod

texts.ru:
Дилшоду 32 года. Он женат , у него трое детей. Живет Дилшод в сельской местности где основным источником дохода является животноводство и земледелие. С малых лет Дилшод привык ухаживать за домашним скотом помогая родителям. Его жена помогает ему  в хозяйстве она также ухаживает за скотом , доит коров и перерабатывает  молоко. Также Дилшод вместе со своей семьей имеют сад и изготавливают сухофрукты. Дети этой молодой семьи подрастают и тоже помогают родителям. Они также вырастут трудолюбивыми людьми. Но пока для того , чтобы прокормить семью и помогать пожилым родителям Дилшоду необходимо много работать. 
С наступлением зимы  ему необходимо дополнить запасы кормов. Так как Дилшод раньше брал кредит в "Арванде" и доволен тем как его обслуживают он в очередной раз  хочет взять заем для приобретения кормов.
texts.en:
Dilshod is 32 years old. He is married and has three children. Dilshod lives in the countryside where the main source of income is livestock breeding and farming. From a young age, Dilshod has gotten used to looking after cattle, milking cows and processing milk. Dilshod and his family have also have a garden and they make dried fruit. The children of this young family are still growing but they also help their parents. They are growing up to be hardworking individuals. For the time being, in order to feed his family and help out his elderly parents, Dilshod must work a lot.

As the winter sets in, he needs to fill up his reserve of cattle feed. As Dilshod has taken out a loan from Arvand previously and was pleased with how it was handled, her wants to take out a loan again to purchase cattle feed.

loans.use: to buy cattle feed.

loans.name: Tani Sari Group

texts.en:
Tani Sari is a group of farmers who own land or rent land from others. In the last period, they borrowed money to buy seeds and fertilizer. Six months ago was the dry season, so they decided to plant crops that are suitable for the dry season, such as peanuts, cassava and other crops. Currently they are already harvesting, and they got the expected results. That's because the results of the plantation is very nice and they have a high selling price. Tani Sari group members are very grateful for the results that they got, and they thank the lenders, Kiva and MUK.

After paying off the loan, the Tani Sari group re-applied for a loan for the cost of fertilizer, seeds and maintenance cost. This month is the start of the rainy season, and they have to change the way they prepare the land and plant crops that’s suitable for the rainy season. 

Sayu Putu is using her part of the loan to pay for the cost of tillage, fertilizer, and to buy corn and chili seeds. She hopes the corn and chilies can grow well and she can sell them at a high price. Sayu Putu has a dream and hope to repair her house with the results obtained from the garden. Two of the members are not pictured because they had to attend a Ngaben (burning corpse) ceremony at the Temple.

loans.use: to pay for the cost of tillage, fertilizer, and corn and chili seeds

loans.name: Munira

texts.ru: Эту сельскую женщину с района Кубадиён зовут Мунира, ей 35 лет. Она мать несовершеннолетних детей. Ее муж работает вместе с ней. Они на протяжении двух лет занимаются выращиванием пшеницы, картофеля, а также других видов огородных культур. В данный момент Мунира вместе с мужем проводит вспашку и обработку почвы для нового посева. Они планируют посадить картофель и к следующему году получить хороший урожай. Для реализации этой цели Мунира обратилась за кредитом. Она хочет приобрести семена картофеля и минеральные удобрения. Благодаря вашей поддержки эта семья сможет продолжить свою сельскохозяйственную деятельность и не потерять источник дохода.
texts.en: This country woman's name is Munira. She is 35 years old and lives in the Qubadiyon District. She is a mother to young children. Her husband works alongside her. For the past two years, they have been growing wheat and potatoes as well as two different types of orchard crops. Currently, Munira and her husband are tilling and cultivating their soil for the new sowing season. They plan to plant potatoes and receive a good harvest next year. To accomplish this goal, Munira applied for a loan. She wants to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers. Thanks to your support, this family will be able to continue their agricultural business and not lose their source of income.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is now 57 years old.  He used his previous loan from VisionFund Kenya to buy goats for rearing, and he was able to repay the loan well. He also does dairy farming and grows cash crops to sell, and the business has been profitable.

He plans to use this loan to buy dairy feeds, seeds and fertilizer. He will use the anticipated profits to grow his farming business. 

This is Samuel's fourth loan term from VisionFund Kenya, and he has paid his previous loans successfully. His future hopes are to grow his business,  be successful and make more income.

loans.use: to buy dairy feeds, seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is a 35-year-old married woman. She is running a small general store at her home. 

Her husband is a salesman. His income is not enough to meet the expenses of his entire family.  Therefore, she started her own business to generate more income for her family. Her shop is popular in her community, and she earns enough to contribute to the family income. 

Naseem is a mother of four children, and is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life. She requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy packets of salts, biscuits, oil, sugar, rice and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store and to earn good profits.

loans.use: to buy packets of salts, biscuits, oil, sugar, rice and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store, and to earn good profits.

loans.name: Tikuoneni Group

texts.en:
Allisineti is 47 years old and has eight children, and their responsibility lies in her hands. 

Allisineti sells second-hand clothes to the nearest market. She started this business in order to find funds to adequately support her family. Despite these efforts, life is a struggle for her. As such, she decided to take a loan so that she can sufficiently meet the needs of her family members by being able to pay their medical bills and provide them with basic needs.  

Allisineti will use the loan to expand her business by purchasing more bales of second-hand clothes. She plans to build a better house for her family members. Although she still faces some minor challenges, accessing loans have improved her living standards as she is now able to provide food for her family members.

loans.use: to buy bales of second-hand clothes

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is 26 years old and widowed with two children. She does dairy farming in Nakuru town, and she has been in this business for five years now. She currently makes a monthly income of KES 60,000. 

She plans to use this loan to buy dairy feeds for her dairy cows. She will use the anticipated profits to educate her children and buy more dairy cows. 

This is her fourth loan term from VisionFund Kenya, and she paid her previous loans successfully. Her future hopes are to grow her farming business and be successful.

loans.use: to buy dairy feeds.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 57 years old. He is married to Rose, and together they have been blessed with two children, whose ages are 14 and 12 years, respectively.

John sells energy saving cook stoves, a business he has done for the last year, earning a monthly income of KES 14,000.  John has requested his first loan with VisionFund Kenya of KES. 7,000, which he intends to use to purchase more energy saving and environmentally friendly cook stoves.

With the anticipated profits, John will be able to expand his business.  His hopes and dreams for the future are to better his life and that of his family.

loans.use: to purchase more energy saving and environmentally friendly cook stoves.

loans.name: Shabana

texts.en:
Shabana is a 38-year-old married lady and has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Shabana  makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make sure her store is fully stocked, Shabana requested a loan of 50,000 PKR, which she will use to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers. In this way, she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. 

Shabana wishes to utilize part of her revenues to provide a good quality life for her family members.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, grains, biscuits, oil and flour from the market at lower rates to make her stock available for her customers

loans.name: Ataya

texts.en:
Ataya is 19-year-old single man from Rafah city. His father works as an employee in the public sector, where he gets a low income.  This is the only source of income to the family. 

Ataya is a university student specializing in business administration. He would like to take the B.A. degree and find a job in the future to help his family with part of their expenses.

Ataya took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new laptop for his study.  By taking this loan, Ataya will be able to do his homework and write reports easily.  Ataya appears in the photo with his new laptop

loans.use: to buy a new laptop for his study.

loans.name: Huseyn

texts.ru:
Хусейн молодой и жизнерадостный мужчина 30 лет. Он женат и имеет одного ребенка. Хусейн очень  трудолюбивый человек. После окончания средней школы он искал себе подходящую работу. Тем временем он работал на стройке, но тяжелый труд разнорабочего было не по нему. Подзаработав немного денег он открыл шашлычную. Вначале он арендовал небольшое помещение. Бизнес начал приносить доход. В течении семи лет накопив деньги он купил здание под столовую на местном рынке. Хусейн сам трудится и зарабатывает на жизнь, так как ему не на кого положится. Его родители пенсионеры.
 Хусейн хочет расширить свой бизнес. Но для этого ему не хватает собственных средств. Он обратился в МДО Арванд за кредитом для расширения своей деятельности. Он заранее благодарит за поддержку.
texts.en:
Huseyn is a cheerful 30-year-old young man. He is married and has one child. Huseyn is a very hardworking person. After graduating from secondary school, he looked for suitable work for himself. In the meantime, he worked on a construction site, but the difficult manual labor of a general contractor was not for him. Having earned some money, he opened a kebab restaurant. At first, he rented a small premises. The business began to bring in a profit. Having saved money over the course of seven years, he bought a building just outside of a cafeteria at the local market. Huseyn works hard and earns a living as he does not depend on anyone else. His parents are pensioners.

Huseyn wants to expand his business. However, he does not have enough personal savings for this. He turned to MDO Arvand for a loan to expand his business. He thanks you in advance for the support.

loans.use: to expand his kebab restaurant.

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en:
Shahida is a 39-year-old, married woman. She is been involved in the business of cloth trade. She purchases varieties of cloth at low prices from the city market and sells them in her own town. She has a strong customer base. 

Shahida has requested a loan of 55,000 PKR. She wants to buy greater varieties of cloth in different colours for her business to boost her earnings.

loans.use: to buy greater variety of cloth in different colours for her business to boost her earnings

loans.name: Rahana

texts.en:
Rahana is a 45-year-old, married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband from the corner of her house. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts through the years. 

Rahana is a mother of five children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. 

Rahana wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy packs of salts, biscuits, rice, spices and juices to handle the increasing demands of her customers efficiently and expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits, rice, spices and juices to handle increasing demands of her customers

loans.name: Kos Wende Group

texts.fr:
Mme S.MARIE  est la représentante du groupe KOS WENDE. Mme se porte bien. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 21ans et le moins âgé a 01an. 02 vont à l’école.
Elle vend des condiments, des céréales depuis 08ans. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de son quartier. 
Elle veut  s’acheter 05sacs de gombo et 03 de condiments frais.
Mme veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son commerce. Elle ambitionne  étendre les limites de son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. S. Marie is the leader of the Kos Wende group. She is doing well. She is married with three children. The oldest is 21 and the youngest is under a year. Two of them go to school.
